GSP33brssgo2u:2768: tapyastu puruṣo ya ekaḥ paryāyeṇobhābhyāṃ saṃbadhyata iti tayostapyatāpakayorekātmatāyāṃ mokṣānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2772: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvānyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātām /
GSP33brssgo2u:2774: nahyagnirekaḥ sansvamātmānaṃ dahati prakāśayati vā satyapyauṣṇyaprakāśādidharmabhede pariṇāmitve ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:2777: ucyate- kiṃ na paśyasi karmabhūto jīvaddehastapyastāpakaḥ saviteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2778: nanu taptirnāma duḥkhaṃ sā cetayiturnācetanasya dehasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:2779: yadi hi dehasyaiva taptiḥ syātsā dehanāśe svayameva naśyatīti tannāśāya sādhanaṃ naiṣitavyaṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:2780: ucyate- dehābhāve 'pi kevalasya cetanasya taptirna dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2781: naca tvayāpi taptirnāma vikriyā cetayituḥ kevalasyeṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2784: kathaṃ tavāpi tapyatāpakabhāvaḥ sattvaṃ tapyaṃ tāpakaṃ raja iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:2789: nahi ḍuṇḍubhaḥ sarpaṃ ivetyetāvatā saviṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2790: sarpo vā ḍuṇḍubha ivetyetāvatā nirviṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2793: atha pāramārthikameva cetanasya tapyatvamabhyupagacchasi tavaiva sutarāmanirmokṣaḥ prasajyeta ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2796: tataścātyantiko mokṣa upapanna iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:2799: aupaniṣadasya tvātmaikatvābhyupagamādekasya ca viṣayaviṣayibhāvānupapattervikārabhedasya ca vācārambhaṇamātratvaśravaṇādanirmokṣaśaṅkā svapne 'pi nopajāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2800: vyavahāre tu yatra yathā dṛṣṭastapyatāpakabhāvastatra tathaiva sa iti na codayitavyaḥ parihartavyo vā bhavati // 10 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:2814: tasmādbhrāntimūlatvātsāṃkhyaśāstrasya tena nirdeṣavedāntasamanvayasya na virodha iti siddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:2820: ato na vyavahāralopa ityāśaṅkya vahneriva tābhyāmātmanomokṣo na syādityāha-yadi cetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2821: nanu satyapi dharmiṇi svabhāvanāśo mokṣa upapadyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:2831: na hi svasya svārthatvamasti kāmyasyaiva kāmayitṛtvāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2837: tayā tapyayā buddhyā puruṣasya saṃyogaḥ svasvāmibhāvastasya heturanādiravivekastasya parihāro vivekastasmānnityamuktasyāpi puruṣasya kathañcidupacārānmokṣopapattirityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:2838: yathā yoddhṛgatau jayaparājayau rājanyupacaryete tathā puruṣādatyantabhinnabuddhigatau bandhamokṣau puruṣe upacaryete /
GSP33brssgo2u:2848: yatra tapyatāpakabhāvo dṛṣṭastatraiveti vyavahārapakṣamādāya siddhāntī brūte-kiṃna paśyasīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2850: acetanasyaiva dehasya taptirneti vadatā sāṃkhyena vaktavyaṃ kiṃ cetanasya kevalasya taptiḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2860: tarhi jalacandrasya calanavanmithyaiva taptirityasmatpakṣa āgata ityāha-paramārthata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2861: ivaśabdamātreṇa kathaṃ mithyā taptyavagama iti cettaducyate-ivaśabdastapyabuddhisattvasādṛśyaṃ brūte,
GSP33brssgo2u:2862: tacca sādṛśyaṃ puruṣasya tapyatvarūpaṃ cet kalpitameva vastutastaptyabhāvādityupapādayati-na cediti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2866: saviṣayatvaṃ nirviṣayatvaṃ cevaśabdārthaḥ kalpita eva draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2867: sāṃkhyasyāvidyake tapyatāpakatve sati mamāpi kiñcinna duṣyati kintu dṛṣṭameva saṃpannamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2868: yadi mithyātapyatvāṅgīkāre 'pasiddhāntaḥ syāditi bhītyā satyaṃ tapyatvaṃ puruṣasyocyate tathāpyapasiddhāntaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2876: nimittamavivekātmakadarśanaṃ tamastena sahitaḥ sanimittaḥ saṃyegaḥ puruṣasya guṇasvāmitvarūpastadapekṣatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2878: nimittasya nivṛttyabhāvānna mokṣa iti siddhāntī pariharati-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2883: vyavahārastu bhedāṅgīkārāttapyatāpakabhāvo bandhaḥ tattvajñānāttannivṛttiścopapadyata iti na codyāvasara ityarthaḥ //10//
GSP33brssgo2u:2889: tatrādau tāvadyo 'ṇuvādinā brahmavādini doṣa utprekṣyate sa pratisamādhīyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2890: tatrāyaṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāmabhyupagamaḥ - kāraṇadravyasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhante,
GSP33brssgo2u:2892: tasmāccetanasya brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatve 'bhyupagamyamāne kārye 'pi jagati cetanyaṃ samaveyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2893: tadadarśanāttu na cetanaṃ brahma jagatkāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2896: eṣā teṣāṃ prakriyā- paramāṇavaḥ kila kañcitkālamanārabdhakāryā yathāyogaṃ rūpādimantaḥ pārimaṇḍalyaparimāṇaśca tiṣṭhanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2897: te ca paścādadṛṣṭādipuraḥsarāḥ saṃyogasacivāśca santo dvyaṇukādikrameṇa kṛtsnaṃ kāryajātamārabhante /
GSP33brssgo2u:2899: yadā dvau paramāṇū dvyaṇukamārabhete tadā paramāṇugatā rūpādiguṇaviśeṣāḥ śuklādayo dvyaṇuke śaklādīnaparānārabhante /
GSP33brssgo2u:2903: yadāpi dve dvyaṇuke caturaṇukamārabhete tadāpi samānaṃ dvyaṇukasamavāyināṃ śuklādīnāmārambhakatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2906: yadāpi bahavaḥ paramāṇavo bahūni vā dvyaṇukāni dvyaṇukasahito vā paramāṇuḥ kāryamārabhate tadāpi samānaiṣā yojanā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2907: tadevaṃ yathā paramāṇoḥ parimaṇḍalātsato 'ṇu hrasvaṃ ca dvyaṇukaṃ jāyate mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukādi na parimaṇḍalam,
GSP33brssgo2u:2908: yathā vā dvyaṇukādaṇorhrasvācca sato mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukaṃ jāyate nāṇu no hrasvam,
GSP33brssgo2u:2909: evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jagajjaniṣyata ityabyupagame kiṃ tava cchinnam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2910: atha manyase virodhinā parimāṇāntareṇākrāntaṃ kāryadravyaṃ dvyaṇukādītyato nārambhakāṇi kāraṇagatāni pārimaṇḍalyādīnītyabhyupagacchāmi,
GSP33brssgo2u:2912: yena kāraṇagatā cetanā kārye cetanāntaraṃ nārabheta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2917: yathā kāraṇe vidyamānānāmapi pārimāṇḍalyādināmanārambhakatvamevaṃ caitanyasyāpītyasyāṃśasya samānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2920: naca parimāṇāntarārambhe vyagrāṇi pārimāṇḍalyādīnītyataḥ svasamānajātīyaṃ parimāṇāntaraṃ nārabhante parimāṇāntarasyānyahetutvābhyupagamāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2926: dravyāntare guṇāntare vārabhyamāṇe sarveṣāmeva kāraṇaguṇānāṃ svāśrayasamavāyaviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2932: naca dravyasya dravyamevodāhartavyaṃ guṇasya vā guṇa eveti kaścinniyame heturasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2933: sūtrakāro 'pi bhavatāṃ dravyasya guṇamudājahāra- 'pratyakṣāpratyakṣāṇāmapratyakṣatvātsaṃyogasya pañcātmakaṃ na vidyate' (vai. sū. 4.2.2) iti
GSP33brssgo2u:2934: yathā pratyakṣāpratyakṣayorbhūmyākāśayoḥ samavayansaṃyogo 'pratyakṣa evaṃ pratyakṣāpratyakṣeṣu pañcasu bhūteṣu samavayaccharīramapratyakṣaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2937: etaduktaṃ bhavati- guṇaśca saṃyogo dravyaṃ śarīram /
GSP33brssgo2u:2944: nanvatideśo 'pi samānanyāyatayā kṛtaḥ 'etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ' (bra.sū. 2.1.12) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2946: tasyaiva tvayaṃ vaiśeṣikaprakriyārambhe tatprakriyānugatena nidarśanena prapañcaḥ kṛtaḥ // 11 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:2947: FN: paramāṇuḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ tadgataṃ parimāṇaṃ pārimāṇḍalyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2950: yadyapi sāṃkhyamatanirāsānantaraṃ paramāṇuvādo nirākartavyaḥ svamatasthāpanasya smṛtipāde
GSP33brssgo2u:2952: tathā brahmaguṇacaitanyānanvayādbrahmaṇo 'pi nopādānatvamiti doṣo dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatilābhādatra samādhīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2954: sa kiṃ yaḥ samavāyikāraṇaguṇaḥ sa kāryadravye svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhakastantuśauklyavaditi
GSP33brssgo2u:2955: nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe nyāyasyāvyabhicārādvirudhyata iti prāpte vyabhicārānna
GSP33brssgo2u:2957: yadyapi 'na vilakṣaṇatvāt'ityatra cetanādacetanasargaḥ sādhitastathāpi vaiśeṣikanyāyasya tadīyaprakriyayā vyabhicāroktyarthatvādasya sūtrasya na gatārthatā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2958: pralayakāle paramāṇavo niścalā asaṃyuktāstiṣṭhanti sargakāle cādṛṣṭavadātmasaṃyogātteṣu karma bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:2960: kāraṇaguṇāḥ kārye guṇāntaramānabhanta iti sāmānyena prakriyāmuktvā viśeṣatastāmāha-yadā dvāviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2963: tacca svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhakaṃ na bhavatītyuktanyāyasya vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2967: yathāśrute tu dvābhyāṃ dvyaṇukābhyāṃ mahataścaturaṇukasyārambho na yujyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:2968: kāraṇagataṃ mahatvaṃ bahutvaṃ vā vinā kārye mahatvāyogāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2969: prakaṭārthakārāstu yaddvābhyāṃ dvyaṇukābhyāmārabdhaṃ kārye mahatvaṃ dṛśyate tasya
GSP33brssgo2u:2970: hetuḥ pracayo nāma praśithilāvayavasaṃyoga iti rāvaṇapraṇīte bhāṣye dṛśyata iti cirantanavaiśeṣikadṛṣṭyedaṃ bhāṣyamityāhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2972: yadyapi tārkikā dvābhyāmeva paramāṇubhyāṃ dvyaṇukaṃ tribhirdvyaṇukaistryaṇukamiti kalpayanti tathāpi tarkasyāpratiṣṭhānānna niyama iti matvā brūte-yadāpi bahava iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2974: kāryadravyaparimāṇaṃ tu na kāraṇaparimāṇārabhyaṃ kintu kāraṇagatasaṃkhyārabhyamiti prakriyā tulyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2975: evaṃ prakriyāṃ darśayayitvā sūtraṃ yojayan vyabhicāramāha-tadevamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2978: aṇuhrasvebhyo dvyaṇukebhyo 'ṇudravyaṃ na jāyate hrasvamapi na jāyata iti vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2980: tathā ca hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvyaṇukaparamāṇubhyāṃ mahaddīrghāṇuvaccetanādacetanaṃ jāyata iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2981: tatra hrasvānmahaddīrghaṃ tryaṇukaṃ parimaṇḍalādaṇu dvyaṇukamiti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2987: tadutpatteḥ prāgvirodhyabhāvāt dvyaṇuke pārimāṇḍalyārambhaḥ kiṃ na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2988: nanu virodhiparimāṇena sahaiva dravyaṃ jāyata ityata āha-ārabdhamapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2995: kāraṇānāṃ dvyaṇukānāṃ bahutvāt tryaṇuke mahatvaṃ mṛdo mahatvāt ghaṭe mahatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3003: teṣāmanārambhakatve kāryadravyasya virodhiguṇākrāntatvaṃ vyagratvamasaṃnidhirvā na heturityuktiphalamāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:3004: yattu kāraṇaguṇaḥ svasamānaguṇārambhaka iti vyāpteḥ sāmānyaguṇeṣu pārimāṇḍalyādiṣu
GSP33brssgo2u:3005: vyabhicāre 'pi yo dravyasamavāyikāraṇagato viśeṣaguṇaḥ sa svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhaka
GSP33brssgo2u:3014: guṇāt dravyavaccetanādacetanārambha iti vilakṣaṇārambhakatvāṃśe 'yaṃ dṛṣṭānta iti pariharati-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3026: sa ca vāda itthaṃ samuttiṣṭhata- paṭādīni hi loke sāvayavāni dravyāṇi svānugateraiva saṃyogasacivaistantvādibhirdravyairārabhyamāṇāni dṛṣṭāni
GSP33brssgo2u:3027: tatsāmānyena yāvatkiñcitsāvayavaṃ tatsarvaṃ svānugateraiva saṃyogasacivaistairdravyairārabdhamiti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3028: sa cāyamavayavāvayavivibhāgo yato nivartate so 'pakarṣaparyantagataḥ paramāṇuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3031: nacākāraṇena kāryeṇa bhavitavyamityataḥ paramāṇavo jagataḥ kāraṇamiti kaṇabhugabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3032: tānīmāni catvāri bhūtāni bhūmyudakatejaḥpavanākhyāni sāvayavānyupalabhya caturvidhāḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3033: paramāṇavaḥ parikalpyante teṣāṃ cāpakarṣaparyantagatatvena parato vibhāgāsaṃbhavādvanaśyatāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:3034: pṛthivyādīnāṃ paramāṇuparyanto vibhāgo bhavati sa pralayakālaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3035: tataḥ sargakāle ca vāyavīyeṣvaṇuṣvadṛṣṭāpekṣaṃ karmotpadyate tatkarma svāśrayamaṇumaṇvantareṇa saṃniyukti tato dvyaṇukādikrameṇa vāyurutpadyate
GSP33brssgo2u:3039: aṇugatebhyaśca rūpādibhyo dvyaṇukādigatāni rūpādīni saṃbhavanti tantupaṭanyāyeneti kāṇādā manyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:3045: yathādṛṣṭaṃ kimapi karmaṇo nimittamabhyupagamyeta tasyāsaṃbhavānnaivāṇuṣvādyaṃ karma syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3047: śarīrapratiṣṭhe hi manasyātmanaḥ saṃyoge satyātmaguṇaḥ prayatno jāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3049: sargottarakālaṃ hi tatsarvaṃ nādyasya karmaṇo nimittaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3050: athādṛṣṭamādyasya karmaṇo nimittamityucyeta tatpunarātmasamavāyi vā syādaṇusamavāyi vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3052: nahyacetanaṃ cetanenānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ pravartate pravartayati veti sāṃkhyaprakriyāyāmabhihitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3059: saṃyogābhāvācca tannibandhanaṃ dvyaṇukādi kāryajātaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3062: pradeśavato dravyasya pradeśavatā dravyāntareṇa saṃyogasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3065: kalpitānāmavastutvādavastveva saṃyoga iti vastunaḥ kāryasyāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3067: yathācādisarge nimittābhāvātsaṃyogotpattyarthaṃ karma nāṇūnāṃ saṃbhavatyevaṃ mahāpralaye 'pi vibhāgotpattyarthaṃ karma naivāṇūnāṃ saṃbhavet
GSP33brssgo2u:3069: adṛṣṭamapi bhogaprasiddhyarthaṃ na pralayaprasiddhyarthamityato nimittābhāvānna syādaṇūnāṃ saṃyogotpattyarthaṃ vibhāgotpattyarthaṃ vā karma
GSP33brssgo2u:3075: nāsya prāsaṅgikena pūrvādhikaraṇena saṃgatirapekṣiteti manvānaḥ pradhānasyeśvarānadhiṣṭhitasyākāraṇatve
GSP33brssgo2u:3079: sa kiṃ mānamūlo bhrāntimūlo veti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣayati-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3080: taiḥ paṭādibhiḥ sāmānyaṃ kṣityādeḥ kāryardravyatvaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3087: vimataṃ sāvayavatvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ yato nivartate sa nyūnaparimāṇasyāpakarṣasya paryantatvenāvasānabhūmitvenāvagataḥ paramāṇurityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3099: evaṃ kāṇādamatasya mānamūlatvāttena vedāntasamanvayasya virodhādasiddhiriti pūrvapakṣe phalam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3101: pralaye vibhaktānāṃ paramāṇūnāmanyatarakarmaṇo 'bhayakarmaṇā vā saṃyogo vācyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3110: sthirasya vegavaddravyasaṃyogāviśeṣo 'bhighātaḥ sa eva calasya nodanamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3113: jaḍātmavadaṇorāśrayatvaṃ ki na syāditi matvā vikalpaḥ kṛta iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3121: vibhusaṃyogasyāṇuṣu sadā sattvāt kriyāsātatye pralayābhāvaḥ syāditi dūṣayati-saṃbandheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3123: yajjñānaṃ taccharīrajanyamiti vyāptivirodhena nityajñānāsiddhestadguṇa īśvaro nāsti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3127: saṃyogasya vyāpyavṛttitve ekasminnitarasyāntarbhāvātkāryasya pṛthutvāyogāt sarvaṃ kāryaṃ paramāṇumātraṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3128: kiñca sāṃśadravye saṃyogasyaikāṃśavṛttitvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadvirodhādvyāpyavṛttitvaṃ na kalpyamityāha-dṛṣṭeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3132: kāṇādānāṃ sargapratyuktau sūtraṃ yojayitvā pralayanirāse 'pi sūtraṃ yojayati-thā ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3138: tathā ca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭanimittayorasattvādubhayathāpi saṃyogārthatvena vibhāgārthatvena ca karma nāsti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3139: ataḥ karmābhāvāttayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgapūrvakayoḥ sargapralayayorabhāva iti sūtrayojanā //12//
GSP33brssgo2u:3148: yathaiva hyaṇubhyāmatyantabhinnaṃ sadvyaṇukaṃ samavāyalakṣaṇena saṃbandhena tābhyāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:3151: tataśca tasya tasyānyonyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavya ityanavasthaiva prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3152: nanviha pratyayagrāhyaḥ samavāyo nityasaṃbaddha eva samavāyibhirgṛhyate nāsaṃbaddhaḥ saṃbandhāntarāpekṣo vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3153: tataśca na tasyānyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavyo yenānavasthā prasajyeteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3155: saṃyogo 'pyevaṃ sati saṃyogibhirnityasaṃbaddha eveti samavāyavannānyaṃ saṃbandhamapekṣeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3158: naca guṇatvātsaṃyogaḥ saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate na samavāyo 'guṇatvāditi yujyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo2u:3165: aṇuvādāsaṃbhava iti yogyatayā saṃbadhyate dvyaṇukasamavāyayoḥ paramāṇubhinnatvasāmyāt dvyaṇukavatsamavāyasyāpi samavāyāntaramityanavasthitirityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3166: nanviha tantuṣu paṭa ityādiviśiṣṭadhīniyāmakaḥ samavāyo na saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate,
GSP33brssgo2u:3168: saṃyogasyāpi svarūpasaṃbandhopapatteḥ samavāyo na syāditi dūṣayati-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3171: guṇatvābhāve 'pi karmasāmānyādīnāṃ samavāyāṅgīkārādguṇatvaṃ samavāyitve na vyāpakam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3181: apicāṇavaḥ pravṛttisvabhāvā vā nivṛttisvabhāvā vobhayasvabhāvā vānubhayasvabhāvā vābhyupagamyante gatyantarābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3191: nimittaṃ ca kālādṛṣṭādikaṃ nityasaṃnihitamiti nityameva pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3196: sāvayavānāṃ dravyāṇāmavayavavaśo vibhajyamānānāṃ yataḥ paro vibhāgo na saṃbhavati
GSP33brssgo2u:3197: te caturvidhā rūpādimantaḥ paramāṇavaścaturvidhasya rūpādimato bhūtabhautikasyārambhakā
GSP33brssgo2u:3198: nityāśceti yadvaiśeṣikā abhyupagacchanti sa teṣāmabhyupagamo nirālambana eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:3203: yadi loke rūpādimadvastu tatsvakāraṇāpekṣayā sthūlamanityaṃ ca dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3204: tadyathā paṭastantūnapekṣya sthūle 'nityaśca bhavati tantavaścaṃśūnapekṣya sthūlā anityāśca bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3207: yacca nityatve kāraṇaṃ tairuktam- 'sadakāraṇavannityam' (vai. sū. 4.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3210: yadapi nityatve dvitīyaṃ kāraṇamuktam- 'anityamiti ca viśeṣataḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ' (vai. sū. 4.1.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3212: asati hi yasminkasmiṃścinnitye vastuni nityaśabdena nañaḥ samāso nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3217: yadapi nityatve tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇamuktam- 'avidyā ca' (vai. sū. 4.1.5)
GSP33brssgo2u:3218: iti, tadyadyevaṃ vivrīyate satāṃ paridṛśyamānakāryāṇāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pratyakṣeṇāgrahaṇamavidyeti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3221: tasya ca prāgevoktatvāt 'avidyā ca' iti punaruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3222: athāpi kāraṇavibhāgātkāraṇavināśāccanyasya tṛtīyasya vināśahetorasaṃbhavo 'vidyā sā paramāṇūnāṃ nityatvaṃ khyapayatīti vyākhyāyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3223: nāvaśyaṃ vinaśyadvastu dvābhyāmeva hetubhyāṃ vinaṣṭumarhatiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3224: saṃyogasacive hyanekasmiṃśca dravye dravyāntarasyārambhake 'bhyupagamyamāna etadevaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3225: yadā tvapāstaviśeṣaṃ sāmānyātmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ viśeṣavadavasthāntaramāpadyamānamārambhakamabhyupagamyate tadā ghṛtakāṭhinyavilayanavanmūrtyavasthāvilayanenāpi vināśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3228: kiṃ ca paramāṇavaḥ samavāyikāraṇavantaḥ kāraṇāpekṣayā sthūlā anityāśca,
GSP33brssgo2u:3229: rūpavattvāt rasavattvādgandhavattvāt sparśavattvāt ghaṭavaditi sūtraṃ yojayituṃ paraprakriyāmāha-sāvayavānāmityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3230: nanvatra paramāṇutvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ tadviruddhaṃ sthūlatvaṃ kathaṃ sādhyata iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:3234: naca tarhi vāyuḥ kāraṇavāniti pṛthaksādhane rūpādihetūnāṃ bhāgāsiddhyabhāve 'pi siddhasādhanatā syāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3236: yatra rūpaṃ tatsakāraṇamiti vyāptigrahakāle vāyutvādyavacchedena sādhyasiddhyabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3239: ātmavaditi satpratipakṣamutthāpya viśeṣyāsiddhyā dūṣayati-yacca nityatva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3243: ghaṭābhāvāvaditi nityasya kvacitsiddhau kāryamanityamiti viśeṣataḥ kārye nityatvapratiṣedhāt kāraṇabhūtaparamāṇuṣu nityatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3247: kāraṇanityatvasya pramāṇāntareṇa jñānaṃ vinā kāryamanityamiti vyavahārayogādityāha-naca śabdeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3248: yadi pramāṇāntaraṃ kāraṇanityatve syāttadāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ samūlo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3250: vaṭe yakṣavyavahārādapi tatsiddhiprasaṅgāt mūlajñāne tu tenaiva aśeṣasiddhervyavahāropanyāsavaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3251: evaṃ paramāṇunityatve kāṇādasūtradvayaṃ nirasya tṛtīyaṃ nirasyati-yadapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3252: satāmaṇūnāṃ dṛśyamānasathūlakāryāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇajñānamavidyeti yadi sūtrārthaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3263: avayavānāṃ saṃyogena dravyāntarotpattirāraṃbha iti yadi mataṃ syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:3266: ataḥ kāraṇameva svato nirviśeṣaṃ viśeṣavadavasthātmanā kāryamityanubhavabalādāstheyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3267: tathā cāṇūnāmapyavidyāpariṇāmarūpāṇāṃ pralayanimittena kālādinā piṇḍātmakasvarūpatirobhāvena kāraṇabhāvāpattirvināśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3272: vastutastu ghṛtaṃ kaṭhinaṃ dravamityanusyūtaghṛtapariṇāmaviśeṣo dravyameva kāṭhinyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3273: naca dravyatve 'pyavayavavibhāgādeva tasya nāśa iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3276: kiñca pralaye nāsīdrajo nānyat kiñcanetyaṇūnāṃ nāśasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3284: sparśaguṇaḥ sūkṣmatamo vāyurityevametāni catvāri bhūtānyupacitāpacitaguṇāni sthūlasūkṣmatarasūkṣmatamatāratamyopetāni ca loke lakṣyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:3290: akalpyamāne tūpacitāpacitaguṇatve paramāṇutvasāmyaprasiddhaye yadi tāvatsarvaṃ ekaikaguṇā eva kalpyeraṃstatastejasi sparśasyopalabdhirna syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:3302: pārthivaḥ paramāṇūradhikaguṇastata ekaikanyūnaguṇā jalādiparamāṇava iti kalpyate, na vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3310: neti pakṣe sarveṣāmāṇūnāṃ sāmyārthamekaikaguṇavattvaṃ vā syāccaturguṇavatvaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3316: ayaṃ tu paramāṇukāraṇavādo na kaiścidapi śiṣṭaiḥ kenacidapyaṃśena parigṛhīta ityatyantamevānādaraṇīyo vedavādibhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3322: yathā hi loke śaśakuśapalāśaprabhṛtīnāmatyantabhinnānāṃ satāṃ netaretarādhīnatvaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3324: atha bhavati dravyādhīnatvaṃ guṇādīnāṃ tato dravyabhāve bhāvāddravyābhāve 'bhāvāddravyameva saṃsthānādibhedādanekaśabdapratyayabhāgbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3330: iha tu śuklaḥ kambalo rohiṇī dhenurnīlamutpalamiti dravyasyaiva tasya tasya tena tena viśeṣeṇa pratīyamānatvānnaiva dravyaguṇayoragnidhūmayoriva bhedapratītirasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3339: paṭasya tu guṇāḥ śuklatvādayaḥ paṭadeśā abhyupagamyante na tantudeśāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3340: tathācāhuḥ - 'dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabhante guṇāśca guṇāntaram' (vai. sū. 1.1.10) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3342: tantugatāśca guṇāḥ śuklādayaḥ kāryadravye paṭe śuklādiguṇāntaramārabhanta iti hi te 'bhyupagacchanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3348: yutasiddhayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃyogo 'pyutasiddhayostu samavāya ityayamabhyupagamo mṛṣaiva teṣāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3350: athānyatarāpekṣa evāyamabhyupagamaḥ syādayutasiddhasya kāryasya kāraṇena saṃbandhaḥ samavāya iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3351: evamapi prāgsiddhasyālabdhātmakasya kāryasya kāraṇena saṃbandho nopapadyate dvayāyattatvātsaṃbandhasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:3353: prākkāraṇasaṃbandhātkāryasya siddhāvabhyupagamyamānāyāmayutasiddhyabhāvātkāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyete itīdaṃ duruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3355: saṃyoga evābhyupagamyate na samavāya evaṃ kāraṇadravyeṇāpi saṃbandhaḥ saṃyoga eva syānna samavāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3356: nāpi saṃyogasya samavāyasya vā saṃbandhavyatirekeṇāstitve kiñcitpramāṇamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3359: yathaiko 'pi san devadatto loke svarūpaṃ saṃbandhirūpaṃ cāpekṣyānekaśabdapratyayabhāgbhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3360: manuṣyo brāhmaṇaḥ śrotriyo vadānyo bālo yuvā sthaviraḥ pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3368: kalpitāḥ pradeśā aṇvātmamanasāṃ bhaviṣyantīti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:3370: iyānevāvidyamāno viruddho 'viruddho vārthaḥ kalpanīyo nāto 'dhika iti niyamahetvabhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3372: naca vaiśeṣikaiḥ kalpitebhyaḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ padārthebhyo 'nye 'dhikāḥ śataṃ sahasraṃ vārthā na kalpayitavyā iti nivārako heturasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3374: kaścitkṛpāluḥ prāṇināṃ duḥkhabahulaṃ saṃsāra eva mābhūditi kalpayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3375: anyo vā vyasanī muktānāmapi punarutpattiṃ kalpayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3378: dvābhyāṃ paramāṇubhyāṃ niravayavābhyāṃ sāvayavasya dvyaṇukasyākāśeneva saṃśleṣānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3380: kāryakāraṇadravyayorāśritāśrayabhāvo 'nyathā nopapadyata ityavaśyaṃ kalpyaḥ samavāya iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:3386: paramāṇūnāṃ paricchinnatvādyāvatyo diśaḥ ṣaḍaṣṭau daśa vā tāvadbhiravayavaiḥ sāvayavāste syuḥ sāvayavatvādanityāśceti nityatvaniravayavatvābhyupagamo bādhyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3387: yāṃstvaṃ digbhedabhedino 'vayavānkalpayasi ta eva paramāṇava iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:3389: yathā pṛthivī dvyaṇukādyapekṣayā sthūlatamā vastubhūtāpi vinaśyati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3390: tataḥ sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ ca pṛthivyekajātīyakaṃ vinaśyati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3416: nityaḥ saṃbandhaḥ samavāya iti bhinnāni lakṣaṇāni /
GSP33brssgo2u:3429: abhede dravyaṃ guṇa iti śabdapratyayabhedaḥ kathaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3433: astu guṇādīnāṃ dravyatādātmyamiti vadantaṃ tārkikamanyaṃ pratyāha-tathā satīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3439: tathāpi tatkāryatvaṃ tadadhīnatvaṃ matvā vyabhicāraṃ śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3441: tathāpi tādātmyena pratīyamānatvasya hetorvivakṣitatvānna vyabhicāra ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3445: śauklyasya paṭaniṣṭhatvāt paṭasya tantudeśatvāt paṭaśauklyayorapṛthagdeśatvābhāvācchuklaḥ paṭa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītirna syādityādyaṃ dūṣayati-apṛthagdeśatva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3449: evaṃ ṣaṭpadārthā atyantabhinnā iti siddhānto 'nubhavavirodhena dūṣitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3454: kāraṇasya pṛthaksiddhatve 'kāryamapṛthaksiddhamityuktamupetya saṃbandho 'siddhasya siddhasya veti vikalpyādyaṃ dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate-siddhaṃ bhūtveti
GSP33brssgo2u:3455: satoraprāptayoḥ prāptiḥ saṃyoga ityabhyupagamāttantupaṭayorapi saṃyogāpattirityapasiddhāntaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3458: kiñca saṃbandhasyāpi saṃbandhe 'navasthānādasaṃbaddhasyāniyāmakatvāt saṃbandho 'pi durnirūpa ityāha-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3468: vilakṣaṇaśabdadhīgamyatvādityupalabdhighaṭitena-lakṣaṇena siṅgena prāptasya vastvantarasya saṃyogādeḥ saṃbandhivyatirekeṇānupalabdherabhāvo niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3471: saṃbandhasya saṃbandhyabhede saṃbandhinaḥ sadā sattvātsarvadā saṃbandhabuddhiprasaṅga iti śaṅkāṃ niṣedhati-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3472: parāpekṣayā nairantaryāvasthāyāmaṅgulyoḥ rūparūpiṇośca saṃbandhidhīḥ na svata ityuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3474: saṃpratyadṛṣṭavadātmanāṇūnāṃ saṃyogo 'ṇuṣu kriyāhetuḥ ātmamanoḥ saṃyogo buddhyādyasamavāyikāraṇaṃ nirasyate-tathāṇvātmeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3501: 'vayavāstvayocyante ta eva mama paramāṇavaste 'pi sāvayavāścet tadavayavā eveti evaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:3502: yataḥ paraṃ na vibhāgaḥ sa eva niravayavaḥ paramāṇuriti śaṅkati-yāṃstvamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3505: ayamarthaḥ-yatsavātmanāvibhāgāyogyaṃ vastu sa paramāṇuriti yadyucyeta tarhi brahmaṇa eva paramāṇusaṃjñā kṛtā syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:3507: yadi pṛthivyādijātīyo 'lpaparimāṇaviśrāntibhūmiryaḥ sa paramāṇurityucyeta tarhi tasya na mūlakāraṇatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3513: saṃprati niravayavadravyasya nāśahetvabhāvādātmavadavināśa ityāśaṅkya pūrvoktaṃ parihāraṃ smārayati-vinaśyanta ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3532: naca ta eva truṭināmāno jagaddhateva iti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:3550: tatra te sarvāstitvavādino bāhyamāntaraṃ ca vastvabhyupagacchanti bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ ca cittaṃ caittaṃ ca,
GSP33brssgo2u:3554: catuṣṭaye ca pṛthivyādiparamāṇavaḥ svarasnehoṣṇasvabhāvāste pṛthivyādibhāvena saṃhanyanta iti manyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:3564: anyasya ca kasyaciccetanasya bhoktuḥ praśāsiturvā sthirasya saṃhanturanabhyupagamāt nirapekṣapravṛttyabhyupagame ca pravṛttyanuparamaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brssgo2u:3583: parimāṇabhedena dehāderāśutaravināśāṅgīkārādardhavaināśiko vaiśeṣikastasya nirāsānantaraṃ sarvakṣaṇikavādī buddhistho nirasyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatimāha-vaiśeṣiketi
GSP33brssgo2u:3584: 'nābhāva upalabdheḥ'iti nirasanīyasiddhāntādatra nirasyasiddhāntasya bhedaṃ vaktuṃ tatsiddhāntaṃ vibhajate-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3590: sautrāntiko vaibhāṣiko yogācārī mādhyamikaśceti catvāraḥ śiṣyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3591: teṣvādyayorbāhyārthānāṃ parokṣatvāparokṣatvavivāde 'pyastitvasaṃpratipattestayoḥ siddhāntamekīkṛtya nirasyata ityāha-tatra ye sarvāstitveti
GSP33brssgo2u:3594: tatra saṃdihyate kiṃ mānamūlo bhrāntimūlo vāyaṃ siddhānta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3595: tatra pramāṇamūla iti pūrvapakṣayan siddhāntaṃ tadīyaṃ darśayati-tatra bhūtamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3596: sthiraḥ prapañco brahmahetuka iti vedāntasiddhāntasya mānamūlakṣaṇikasiddhāntavirodhādasiddhiḥ pūrvapakṣe phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3598: pṛthivyādibhūtacatuṣṭayaṃ viṣayendriyātmakaṃ bhautikaṃ ca paramāṇusamudāya eva nāvayavyantaramiti matvā paramāṇūn vibhajate-catuṣṭaye ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3615: yathā vidyuditi teṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvamiti mānamūlo 'yaṃ siddhānta iti prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ yojayati-yo 'yamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3616: sargādau paramāṇūnāṃ ca skandhānāṃ ca svataḥsaṃghātastāvanna saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3619: saṃghāte dehākāre jāte vijñānaṃ vijñāne jāte saṃghāta ityanyonyāśrayāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3620: naca kṣaṇikavijñānādanyaḥ kaścijjīva īśvaro vā tvayābhyupagamyate yaḥ saṃghātakartā bhavet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3621: naca kartāramanapekṣyāṇavaḥ skandhāśca svayameva saṃghātārthaṃ pravartanta iti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:3638: yadyapi bhoktā praśāsitā vā kaściccetanaḥ saṃhantā sthiro nābhyupagamyate tathāpyavidyādīnāmitaretarakāraṇatvādupapadyate lokayātrā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3640: te cāvidyādayo 'vidyā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ nāma rūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśā vedanā tṛṣṇā
GSP33brssgo2u:3641: upādānaṃ bhavo jātirjarā maraṇaṃ śokaḥ paridevanā duḥkhaṃ durmanastetyevañjātīyakā
GSP33brssgo2u:3642: itaretarahetukāḥ saugate samaye kvacitsaṃkṣiptā nirdiṣṭāḥ kvacitprapañcitāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3644: tadevamavidyādikalāpe parasparanimittanaimittikabhāvena ghaṭīyantravadaniśamāvartamāner'thākṣipta upapannaḥ saṃghāta iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3650: yata itaretarapratyayatve 'pyavidyādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvamuttarottarasyotpattimātranimittaṃ bhavedbhavenna tu saṃghātotpatteḥ kiñcinnimittaṃ saṃbhavati
GSP33brssgo2u:3652: atrocyate- yadi tāvadayamabhiprāyo 'vidyādayaḥ saṃghātamantareṇātmānamalabhamānā apekṣante saṃghātamiti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3654: tacca nityeṣvapyaṇuṣvabhyupagamyamāneṣvāśrayāśrayibhūteṣu ca bhokteṣu satsu na saṃbhavatītyuktaṃ vaiśeṣikaparīkṣāyām /
GSP33brssgo2u:3655: kimaṅga punaḥ kṣaṇikeṣvapyaṇuṣu bhoktṛrahiteṣvāśrayiśūnyeṣu vābhyupagamyamāneṣu saṃbhavet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3658: atha manyase saṃghātā evānādau saṃsāre saṃtatyānuvartante tadāśrayāścāvidyādaya iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3663: aniyamābhyupagame 'pi manuṣyapudgalaḥ kadācitkṣaṇena hastī bhūtvā devo vā punarmanuṣyo vā bhavediti prāpnuyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3665: apica yadbhogārthaḥ saṃghātaḥ syātsa nāsti sthiro bhokteti tavābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3666: tataśca bhogo bhogārtha eva sa nānyena prārthanīyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3667: tathā mokṣo mokṣārthaṃ eveti mumukṣuṇā nānyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3670: tasmāditaretarotpattimātranimittatvamavidyādīnāṃ yadi bhavedbhavatu nāma natu saṃghātaḥ siddhyet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3672: FN: kāryaṃ prati ayate gacchatīti pratyayaḥ kāraṇam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3673: vijñānaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpaṃ ceti ṣaḍāyatanāni yasyendriyajātasya tatṣaḍāyatanam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3687: vijñānaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpaṃ ceti ṣaḍāyatanāni yasyendriyajātasya tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3703: avidyādihetukā janmādayo janmādihetukāścāvidyādaya iti mitho hetuhetumadbhāvādarthātsaṃghātasiddhiriti śaṅkāmupasaṃharati-tadevamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3705: avidyādīnāmuttarottarahetutvamaṅgīkṛtya saṃghātahetvabhāvāt saṃghāto na syādityukte pūrvoktaṃ smārayati-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3706: kimavidyādayaḥ saṃghātasya gamakā utotpādakā iti vikalpyādye saṃghātasyotpādakaṃ kiñcidvācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3710: yadā sthireṣvaṇuṣu saṃghātayogyeṣu kartṛṣu cādṛṣṭasahāyeṣu satsu jñānābhāvamātreṇa
GSP33brssgo2u:3717: svābhāvikaḥ khalvayaṃ saṃghātānāṃ hetuhetumadbhāvena pravāho na saṃhantāramapekṣate,
GSP33brssgo2u:3718: pūrvasaṃghātāśrayā avidyādaya uttarasaṃghātapravartakā iti nānyonyāśrayadoṣo 'pītyāśaṅkate-atha manyasa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3721: kiñca bhoktuḥ kṣaṇikatvapakṣe bhogāpavargavyavahāro 'pi durghaṭa ityāha-api ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3722: yo yadicchati sa tatkāle nāsti cedicchāvyarthā,
GSP33brssgo2u:3730: kṣaṇabhaṅgavādino 'yamabhyupagama uttarasminkṣaṇa utpadyamāne pūrvaḥ kṣaṇo nirudhyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3733: atha bhāvabhūtaḥ pariniṣpannāvasthaḥ pūrvakṣaṇa uttarakṣaṇasya heturityabhiprāyastathāpi nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3735: atha bhāva evāsya vyāpāra ityabhiprāyastathāpi naivopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3737: svabhāvoparāgābhyupagame ca hetusvabhāvasya phalakālāvasthāyitve sati kṣaṇabhaṅgābhyupagamatyāgaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3738: vinaiva vā svabhāvoparāgeṇa hetu phalabhāvamabhyupagacchataḥ sarvatra tatprāpteratiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3739: apicotpādanirodhau nāma vastunaḥ svarūpameva vā syātāmavasthāntaraṃ vā vastvantarameva vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3741: yadi tāvadvastunaḥ svarūpamevotpādanirodhau syātāṃ tato vastuśabda utpādanirodhaśabdau ca paryāyāḥ prāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3742: asthāsti kaścidviśeṣa iti manyetotpādanirodhaśabdābhyāṃ madhyavartino vastuna ādyantākhye avasthe abhilapyete iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3746: yadi ca darśanādarśane vastuna utpādanirodhau syātām,
GSP33brssgo2u:3747: evamapi draṣṭṛdharmau tau na vastudharmāviti vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅga eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:3751: dvividho hi kāryasamutpādaḥ sugatasaṃmato hetvadhīnaḥ kāraṇasamudāyādhīnaśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3759: nanu kāryakāle vināśavyāptatve 'pi pūrvakṣaṇe sattvāt kṣaṇikārthasya hetutvamakṣatamiti śaṅkate-ayaṃ bhāveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3765: uktaṃ hi 'bhūtiryeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyata'iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3766: yeṣāṃ kṣaṇikābhāvānāṃ yā bhūtiḥ saiva kriyā kārakaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3784: caturvidhānhetūnpratītya cittacaittā utpadyanta itīyaṃ pratijñā hīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3786: athottarakṣaṇotpattiryāvattāvadavatiṣṭhate pūrvakṣaṇa iti brūyāttato yaugapadyaṃ hetuphalayoḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3792: viṣayakaraṇasahakārisaṃskārāścaturvidhā hetavastān pratītya prāpya cittaṃ rūpādivijñānaṃ caittāścittātmakāḥ sukhādayaśca jāyanta iti pratijñārthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3798: sahetukatvapakṣe 'nvayikāraṇasya mṛdādeḥ kāryasahabhāvāpattyā kṣaṇikatvapratijñāhāniriti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe-athottarakṣaṇetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3804: apica vaināśikāḥ kalpayanti buddhibodhyaṃ trayādanyatsaṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3807: buddhipūrvakaḥ kila vināśo bhāvānāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodho nāma bhāṣyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:3815: etau hi pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhau saṃtānagocarau vā syātāṃ bhāvagocarau vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3819: nahi bhāvānāṃ niranvayo nirupākhyo vināśaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3824: pratīpā pratukūlaḥ saṃkhyā santaṃ bhāvamasantaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā tayā nirodhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3833: pratīpā pratikūlā saṃkhyā santaṃ bhāvamasantaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā,
GSP33brssgo2u:3839: tasmin saṃtāne caramakṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇāntaraṃ karoti vā na vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3881: yenāvaraṇabhāvo viśeṣyate tattarhi vastubhūtamevākāśaṃ manyamānasya saugatasya svābhyupagamavirodhaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3882: saugate hi samaye 'pṛthivī bhagavaḥ kiṃsaṃniścayā' ityasminprativacanapravāhe pṛthivyādīnāmante
GSP33brssgo2u:3883: vāyuḥ 'kiṃsaṃniścayaḥ' ityasya praśnasya prativacanaṃ bhavati 'vāyurākāśasaṃniścayaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3886: apica nirodhadvayamākāśaṃ ca trayamapyetannirūpākhyamavastu nityaṃ ceti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:3891: kiṃ samyak niścaya āśrayo 'syā iti kiṃ saṃniścayā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3894: nanvāgamaprāmāṇye vipratipannānsugatānpratyākāśasya vastutvaṃ kathaṃ sidhyatītyata āha-vipratipannāniti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3899: yathaikaghaṭasattve 'pi ghaṭasāmānyābhāvo nāsti tathaikapakṣisattve 'pi mūrtadravyasāmānyābhāvātmakākāśo nāstyeveti pakṣyantarasaṃcāro na syādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3904: kiṃ samyak niśraya āśrayo 'syā iti kiṃsaṃniśrayā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3912: apica vaināśikaḥ sarvasya vastunaḥ kṣaṇikatāmabhyupayannupalabdhurapi kṣaṇikatāmabhyupeyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3917: kathaṃ hyahamado 'drākṣamidaṃ paśyāmīti ca pūrvottaradarśinyekasminnasati pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3918: apica darśanasmaraṇayoḥ kartaryekasminpratyakṣaḥ pratyabhijñāpratyayaḥ sarvasya lokasya prasiddho 'hamado 'drākṣamidaṃ paśyāmīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3919: yadi hi tayorbhinnaḥ kartā syāttato 'haṃ smārāmyadrākṣīdanya iti pratīyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3924: na nāhamityātmano darśanaṃ nirvṛttaṃ nihnute yathāgniranuṣṇo 'prakāśa iti vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3925: tatraivaṃ satyekasya darśanasmaraṇalakṣaṇadvayasaṃbandhe kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamahāniraparihāryā vaināśikasya syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3927: pratipattīrā janmana ātmaikakartṛkāḥ pratisaṃdadhānaḥ kathaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgavādī vaināśiko
GSP33brssgo2u:3935: tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti pratyayāntaramevedaṃ na pūrvottarakṣaṇadvayagrahaṇanimittamiticet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:3938: pratyayāntarameva cetsādṛśyaviṣayaṃ syāttenedaṃ sadṛśamiti vākyaprayogo 'narthakaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3940: yadā hi lokaprasiddhaḥ padārthaḥ parīkṣakairna parigṛhyate tadā svapakṣasiddhiḥ parapakṣadoṣo vobhayamapyucyamānaṃ parīkṣakāṇāmātmanaśca yathārthatvena na buddhisaṃtānamārohati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3945: bhavedapi kadācidbāhyavastuni vipralambhasaṃbhavāttadevedaṃ syāttatsadṛśaṃ veti saṃdehaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3946: upalabdhari tu saṃdeho 'pi na kadācidbhavati sa evāhaṃ syāṃ tatsadṛśo veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3947: ya evāhaṃpūrvedyuradrākṣaṃ sa evāhamadya smarāmīti niścitatadbhāvopalambhāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3951: kṣaṇikatve jñānadvayānusaṃdhānaṃ ca na syādityāha-kathaṃ hyahamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3953: yo 'hamadaḥ pūrvamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhamadya tatsmarāmīti pratyabhijñānākāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3957: draṣṭṛsmartrorbhede 'haṃ smarāmi anyo 'drākṣīditi pratītiḥ syādityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-yatraivamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3959: smarāmyahamanyo 'drākṣīditi pratyayo yatra tatra bhinnameva kartāraṃ loko 'vagacchatītyavivādamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3960: prakṛtapratyabhijñāyāṃ tādṛśabhedapratyayasya bādhakasyādarśanādātmasthāyitvaṃ durvāramityāha-iha tvahamada iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3961: yathāgnerauṣṇyādikaṃ na bādhate kaścittathā nāhamadrākṣamiti pūrvadarśanaṃ na nihnuta ityanena bādhābhāvāt pratyabhijñā prametyuktaṃ bhavati
GSP33brssgo2u:3962: tathā draṣṭṛsmartroraikye sati sthāyitvaṃ phalitamityāha-tatraivaṃ satīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3967: sādṛśyajñānasya dharmipratiyogijñānādhīnatvāt sthirasya jñāturasattvānna sādṛśyajñānaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3971: kiṃ tarhi kaścideṣa vikalpaḥ svākārameva bāhyatvena viṣayīkurvāṇaḥ kṣaṇāntarāsparśī,
GSP33brssgo2u:3973: atra vaktavyaṃ sādṛśyapratyaye tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti vastutrayaṃ bhāsate na veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3977: atha bhāsate vastutrayaṃ tacca pratyayābhinnameva na bāhyamiti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:3980: vastutrayaṃ jñeyaṃ sādṛśyapratyayādbhinnaṃ sarvalokaprasiddhaṃ taccennāṅgīkriyate sthāyidraṣṭṛprasaṅgabhayena,
GSP33brssgo2u:3981: tarhi tattadākārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikavijñānānāṃ mitho vārtānabhijñatvādekasmin dharmiṇi viruddhānekapakṣasphuraṇātmakavipratipattyasaṃbhavāt svapakṣasādhanādivyavahāro
GSP33brssgo2u:3983: tathā ca tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti bāhyārthayorjñānapūrvakaṃ sādṛśyaṃ jānata ātmanaḥ sthāyitvaṃ durvāramityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3989: na cedānīṃ ghaṭa iti pratyakṣamavartamānakālāsattvaṃ ghaṭasya gocarayadvartamānakṣaṇamātrasatvarūpe kṣaṇikatve mānamiti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:3995: kiñca sādṛśyaṃ pratyabhijñāyāṃ doṣayatā nimittaṃ viṣayatayā vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4002: so 'hamiti pratyabhijñāyā bhramatvaṃ nirasya saṃśayatvaṃ nirasyati-bhavediti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4003: jaḍārthe pratyabhijñāte 'pi bādhasaṃbhāvanayā saṃśayaḥ kadācit syānnātmanītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4019: nahi bījādīnāmupamṛditānāṃ yo 'bhāvastasyābhāvasya śaśaviṣāṇādīnāṃ ca niḥsvabhāvatvāviśeṣādabhāvatve kaścidviśeṣo 'sti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4020: yena bījādevāṅ kuro jāyate kṣīrādeva dadhītyevañjātīyakaḥ kāraṇiśeṣaṇādibhyupagamor'thavānsyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4021: nirviśeṣasya tvabhāvasya kāraṇatvābhyupagame śaśaviṣāṇādibhyo 'pyaṅ kurādayo jāyeran /
GSP33brssgo2u:4023: yadi punarabhāvasyāpi viśeṣo 'bhyupagamyetotpalādīnāmiva nīlatvādistato viśeṣavattvādevābhāvasya bhāvatvamutpalādivatprasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4029: sarvasya ca vastunaḥ svena svena rūpeṇa bhāvātmanaivopalabhyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4035: yeṣvapi bījādiṣu svarūpopamarde lakṣyate teṣvarapi nāsāvupamṛdyamānā pūrvāvasthottarāvasthāyāḥ kāraṇamabhyupagamyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:4039: paramāṇubhyaśca bhūtabhautikalakṣaṇaḥ samudāya utpadyata ityabhyupagamya punarabhāvādbhāvotpattiṃ kalpayadbhirabhyupagatamapahnuvānairvaināśikaiḥ sarvo loka ākulīkriyate // 26 //
GSP33brssgo2u:4040: abhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇavadatyantāsannityaṅgīkṛtya mṛdādināśādasato ghaṭādikaṃ jāyate iti sugatā vadanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4042: na kevalaṃ balādāpadyate kintu svayaṃ darśayanti ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:4048: nityasya niratiśayasya kāryaśaktatve tatkāryāṇi sarvāṇyekasminneva kṣaṇe syuḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4071: naca śaktasya sahakāryapekṣā na yukteti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4104: tasmādbhrāntimūlena kṣaṇikabāhyārthavādena kūṭasthanityabrahmasamanvayasya na virodha iti siddham //27//
GSP33brssgo2u:4109: evaṃ bāhyārtavādamāśritya samudāyāprāptyādiṣu dūṣaṇeṣūdbhāviteṣu vijñānavādī bauddha idānīṃ pratyavatiṣṭhite /
GSP33brssgo2u:4110: keṣāñcitkila bāhye vastunyabhiniveśamālakṣya tadanurodhena bāhyārthavādaprakriyeyaṃ virocitā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4113: tasmiṃśca vijñānavāde buddhyārūḍhena rūpeṇāntastha eva pramāṇaprameyavyavahāraḥ sarva upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4115: kathaṃ punaravagamyate 'ntastha evāyaṃ sarvavyavahāro na vijñānavyatirikto bāhyor'tho 'stīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4117: sa hi bāhyortho 'bhyupagamyamānaḥ paramāṇavo vā syustatsamūhā vā stambhādayaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4122: apicānubhāvamātreṇa sādhāraṇātmano jñānasya jāyamānasya yo 'yaṃ prativiṣayaṃ pakṣapātaḥ stambhajñānaṃ kuḍyajñānaṃ ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamiti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4136: anādau hi saṃsāre bījāṅ kuravadvijñānānāṃ vāsanānāṃ cānyonyanimittanaimittikabhāvena vaicitryaṃ na vipratiṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4145: upalabhyate hi pratipratyayaṃ bāhyor'thaḥ stambhaḥ kuḍyaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4147: yathā hi kaścidbhuñjāno bhujitasādhyāyāṃ tṛptau svayamanubhūyamānāyāmevaṃ brūyānnāhaṃ bhuñje na vā tṛpyāmīti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4148: tadvadindriyasaṃnikarṣeṇa svayamupalabhamāna eva bāhyamarthaṃ nāhamupalabhe naca so 'stīti bruvankathamupādeyavacanaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4149: nanu nāhamahaṃ bravīmi na kañcidarthamupalabha iti kiṃ tūpalabdhivyatiriktaṃ nopalabha iti bravīmi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4154: upalabdhiviṣayatvenaiva tu stambhakuḍyādīnsarve laukikā upalabhante yatpratyācakṣāṇā api bāhyārthameva vyācakṣate yadantarjñeyarūpaṃ tadbahirvadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4155: te 'pi sarvalokaprasiddhāṃ bahiravabhāsamānāṃ saṃvidaṃ pratilabhamānāḥ pratyākhyātukāmāśca bāhyamarthaṃ bahirvadati vatkāraṃ kurvanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4158: tasmādyathānubhavaṃ tattvamabhyupagacchadbhirbahirevāvabhāsata iti yuktamabhyupagantuṃ natu bahirvadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4160: nāyaṃ sādhuradhyavasāyo yataḥ pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttipūrvakau saṃbavāsaṃbhavāvavadhāryete na punaḥ saṃbhavāsaṃbhavapūrvike pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttī
GSP33brssgo2u:4162: yattu na kenacidapi pramāṇenopalabhyate tanna saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:4163: iha tu yathāsvaṃ sarvaireva pramāṇairbāhyor'tha upalabhyamānaḥ kathaṃ vyatirekāvyatirekādivikalpairna saṃbhavatītyucyetopalabdhereva /
GSP33brssgo2u:4167: ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi pratyayaviṣayayorupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityabyupagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4168: apica ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamiti viśeṣaṇayoreva ghaṭapaṭayorbhedo na viśeṣyasya jñānasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:4169: dvābhyāṃ ca bheda etasya siddho bhavatyekasmācca dvayoḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4172: atrāpi hi viśeṣyayoreva darśanasmaraṇayorbhedo na viśeṣaṇas ghaṭasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:4173: yathā kṣīragandhaḥ kṣīrarasa iti viśeṣyayoreva gandharasayorbhedo na viśeṣaṇasya kṣīrasya tadvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:4177: vijñānaṃ vijñānamityabhyupagacchatā bāhyorthaḥ stambhaḥ kuḍyamityevañjātīyakaḥ tasmānnābhyupagamyata eveti yuktamabhyupagantum /
GSP33brssgo2u:4178: atha vijñānaṃ prakāśātmakatvātpradīpavatsvayamevānubhūyate na tathā bāhyo 'pyartha iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:4180: aviruddhaṃ tu lokaprasiddhaṃ svātmavyatiriktena vijñānena bāhyor'thonubhūyata iti necchāsyaho pāṇḍityaṃ mahaddarśitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4183: nanu vijñānasya svarūpavyatiriktagrāhyatve tadapyanena grāhyaṃ tadapyanyenetyanavasthā prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4184: apica pradīpavadavabhāsātmakatvājjñānasya jñānāntaraṃ kalpayataḥ samatvādavabhāsyāvabhāsakabhāvānupapatteḥ kalpanānarthakyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4190: pradīpavadvijñānamavabhāsakāntaranirapekṣaṃ svayameva prathata iti bruvatāpramāṇagamyaṃ vijñānamanavagantṛkamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4193: anubhavarūpatvāttu vijñānasyeṣṭo naḥ pakṣastvayānujñāyata iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:4196: sākṣiṇo 'vagantuḥ svayaṃsiddhatāmupakṣipatā svayaṃ prathate vijñānamityeṣa eva mama pakṣastvayā vācoyuktyantareṇāśrita iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:4202: akhaṇḍanirviśeṣaṃ brahma vijñānaṃ bāhyārthopādānaṃ vadatāṃ vedāntānāṃ bhinnaṃ sākāraṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:4203: kṣaṇikaṃ vijñānaṃ na tato 'nyor'tho 'stīti yogācāramatena virudhyate na veti tanmatasya
GSP33brssgo2u:4207: iti vadan vijñānavādinaḥ sugatābhiprāyajñatvena mandādhikāribhyo bāhyārthavādibhyaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:4217: mukhya eva bhedaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-satyapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4219: ato buddhyārūḍhākāra eva prameyaṃ na bāhyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4229: jātiguṇakarmaṇāṃ dharmiṇaḥ sakāśādabhede 'tyantabhede vā dharmivaddharmyantaravacca na dharmadharmibhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4230: bhedābhedau ca viruddhāviti na santi jātyādyarthā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4248: ubhayavādisaṃmatatvācca vāsanā eva jñānavaicitryahetavo na bāhyārthā ityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4249: kṣaṇikavijñānamātravādasya mānamūlatvāttena nityavijñānavādo virudhyata iti prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-nābhāva ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4260: asattvaṃ vā asattvaniścayo vā ayuktatvaṃ vā utkaṭakoṭikasaṃśayātmakasaṃbhavasyābhāvo vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4266: asaṃbhavo 'sattvaniścayaḥ pramāṇābhāvādhīno na vaiparītyamiti vyavasthāmeva sphuṭayati-yaddhīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4267: uktavyavasthāyāḥ phalaṃ bāhyārthasya pratyakṣādibhiḥ saṃbhavaṃ vadanneva tṛtīyaṃ dūṣayati-iheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4270: na hyasthūlasyaikasya vijñānasya sthūlānekasamūhālambanasya viṣayābhedo yuktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4284: ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi nābhedasādhaka ityāha-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4305: evaṃ pakṣasādhyahetudṛṣṭāntabhedābhāve idaṃ kṣaṇikamasaditi pratijñā na yuktā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4308: sarvānekārthānāṃ jñānamātratve mithaḥ pareṇavā durjñānatvāt uttaranīlajñānaṃ vāsyaṃ pūrvanīlajñānaṃ vāsakamiti pratijñā na yuktā,
GSP33brssgo2u:4316: ajñānenāsya bandho jñānenāsya mokṣa iti ca pratijñā bahvarthajñānasādhyā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4317: ādipadena sāmānyata iṣṭaṃ grāhyamaniṣṭaṃ tyājyamiti śiṣyahitepadeśo 'nekajñānasādhyo gṛhītaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4321: svaviṣayatvādvijñānaṃ svīkriyate nārthaḥ paragrāhyatvāditi śaṅkate-atha vijñānamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4322: viruddhaṃ svīkṛtyāviruddhaṃ tyajatā bauddhatanayena mauḍhyaṃ darśitamityāha-atyanteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4329: anavasthā ca sāmyaṃ ceti doṣadvayaṃ pariharati-tadubhayamapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4330: anityajñānasya janmādimatvena ghaṭavajjaḍasya svena svīyajanmādigrahāyogādasti grāhakākāṅkṣā,
GSP33brssgo2u:4338: svayaṃ prathata iti bruvatā jñātṛśūnyatvaṃ coktā syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:4341: vijñānasya svānyajñātṛśūnyatvamiṣṭameva tvayāpādyate na cāsattvāpattiḥ jñātrabhāvāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4349: dvitīye vijñānavāda eva bhaṅgyantareṇoktaḥ syāditiśaṅkate-sākṣiṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4357: yaduktaṃ bāhyārthapalāyinā svapnādipratyayavajijāgaritagocarā api stambhādipratyayā vinaiva bāhyenārthena bhaveyuḥ pratyayatvāviśeṣāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4365: bādhyate hi svapnopalabdhaṃ vastu pratibuddhasya mithyā mayopalabdho mahājanasamāgama iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4366: nahyasti mama mahājanasamāgamo nidrālagnaṃ tu me mano babhūva tenaiṣā bhrāntirudbabhūveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4368: naivaṃ jāgaritopalabdhaṃ vastu stambhādikaṃ kasyāñcidapyavasthāyāṃ bādhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4371: smṛtyupalabdhayośca pratyakṣamantaraṃ svayamanubhūyater'thaviprayogasaṃyogātmakamiṣṭaṃ putraṃ smarāmi nopalabha upalabdhumicchāmīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4372: tatraivaṃsati na śakyate vaktuṃ mithyā jāgaritopalabdhirūpalabdhitvātsvapnopalabdhivadityubhayorantaraṃ svayamanubhavatā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4375: naca yo yasya svato dharmo na saṃbhavati so 'nyasya sādharmyāttasya saṃbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:4392: kiñca pramāṇajānubhava upalabdhiḥ pakṣo 'pramāṇajaṃ svapnajñānaṃ dṛṣṭānta iti vaidharmyāntaram /
GSP33brssgo2u:4395: asaṃbandhaścāvartamānaśca smṛterartho viṣaya iti nirālambanatvamapyasyāḥ kadācidbhavet,
GSP33brssgo2u:4402: vastuto ghaṭādyanubhavasya nirālambanatvaṃ dharmo di syāttadā kiṃ dṛṣṭāntāgraheṇa,
GSP33brssgo2u:4405: yadi na vastuto dharmo 'sti tadā kiṃ dṛṣṭāntena,
GSP33brssgo2u:4407: ataḥ svato nirālambanatvoktau sālambanatvānubhavabādhabhiyā tvayānumātumārabdhaṃ tathāpi bādho na muñcatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4415: arthopalabdhinimittā hi pratyarthaṃ nānārūpā vāsanā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4416: anupalabhyamāneṣu tvartheṣu kiṃnimittā vicitrā vāsanā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4430: bījādaṅkuro dṛṣṭa ityadṛṣṭe 'pi tajjātīyayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvakalpanā yuktā,
GSP33brssgo2u:4432: nanu nirapekṣavāsanānāṃ sattve dhīvaicitryamasattve tu neti svapne dṛṣṭamiti samūlānavasthetyata āha-yāviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4436: abhinavārthopalabdhivaicitryasya vāsanāṃ vināpi bhāvena vyatirekavyabhicārācca na
GSP33brssgo2u:4437: kvāpi vāsanāmātrakṛtaṃ dhīvaicitryaṃ kintvarthānubhave sati vāsanāsati netyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:4439: yaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa sāśrayo loke dṛṣṭaḥ yathā vegādiriṣvādyāśrayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4444: yadapyālayavijñānaṃ nāma vāsanāśrayatvena parikalpitaṃ tadapi kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamādanavasthitasvarūpaṃ satpravṛttivijñānavanna vāsanānāmadhikaraṇaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:4448: apica vijñānavāde 'pi kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamasya samānatvādyāni bāhyārthavāde kṣaṇikatvanibandhanāni
GSP33brssgo2u:4450: evametau dvāvapi vaināśikapakṣau nirākṛtau bāhyārthavādipakṣo vijñānavādipakṣaśca /
GSP33brssgo2u:4451: śūnyavādipakṣastu sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddha iti tannirākaraṇāya nādaraḥ kriyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4453: FN: nādaraḥ kriyate sūtrāntarāṇi na racyanta etānyevāvṛttyā yojayante /
GSP33brssgo2u:4460: savikāraḥ kūṭastho vā sthāyyātmā yadi nāsti tadā saṃtānasyāvastutvāddeśādyapekṣayā yadvāsanānāmādhānaṃ nikṣepo ye ca smṛtipratyabhijñe yaśca tanmūlo vyavahāraḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4465: jñānajñeyātmakasya sarvasya sattvāsattvābhyāṃ vicārāsahatvācchūnyatāvaśiṣyata iti mādhyamikapakṣasyāpi mānamūlatvamāśaṅkaya sūtrakāraḥ kimiti na nirācakāretyata āha-śūnyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4490: sarvaprakāreṇa yathāyathāyaṃ vaināśikasamaya upapattimattvāya parīkṣyate tathātathā sikatākūpavadvidīryata eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:4494: pradveṣo vā prajāsu viruddhārthapratipattyā vimuhyeyurimāḥ prajā iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4501: ato bhrāntyekamūlasugatasiddhāntena vedāntasiddhāntasya na virodha iti siddham //32//
GSP33brssgo2u:4508: sapta caiṣāṃ padārthāḥ saṃmatā jīvājīvāsravasaṃvaranirjarabandhamokṣā nāma /
GSP33brssgo2u:4511: tayorimamaparaṃ prapañcamācakṣate pañcāstikāyā nāma- jīvāstikāyaḥ pudgalāstikāyo dharmāstikāyo 'dharmāstikāya ākāśāstikāyaśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4524: ya ete saptapadārthā nirdhāritā etāvanta evaṃrūpāśceti te tathaiva vā syurnaiva vā tathā syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4525: itarathā hi tathā vā syuratathā vetyanirdhāritarūpaṃ jñānaṃ saṃśayajñānavadapramāṇameva syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4526: nanvanekātmakaṃ vastviti nirdhāritarūpameva jñānamutpadyamānaṃ saṃśayajñānavannāpramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:4528: niraṅ kuśaṃ hyanekāntatvaṃ sarvavastuṣu pratijānānasya nirdhāraṇasyāpi vastutvaviśeṣātsyāditi syānavnāstītyādivikalpopanipātādinirdhāraṇātmakataiva syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4529: evaṃ nirdhārayiturnirdhāraṇaphalasya ca syātpakṣe 'stitā syācca pakṣe nāstīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4532: aikāntikaphalatvanirdhāraṇe hi sati tatsādhanānuṣṭhānāya sarvo loko 'nākulaḥ pravartate nānyathā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4534: tathā pañcānāmastikāyānāṃ pañcatvasaṃkhyāsti vā nāsti veti vikalpyamānā syāttāvadekasminpakṣe,
GSP33brssgo2u:4535: pakṣāntare tu na syādityato nyūnasaṃkhyātvamadhikasaṃkhyātvaṃ vā prāpnuyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4540: tathā tadavadhāraṇaphalaṃ samyagdarśanamasti vā nāsti vā,
GSP33brssgo2u:4541: evaṃ tadviparītamasamyagdarśanamapyasti vā nāsti veti pralapanmattonmattapakṣasyaiva syānna pratyāyitavyapakṣasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:4542: svargāpavargayośca pakṣe bhāvaḥ pakṣe cābhāvastathā pakṣe nityatā pakṣe cānityatetyanavadhāraṇāyāṃ pravṛttyanupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4547: yattu pudgalasaṃjñakebhyo 'ṇubhyaḥ saṃgātāḥ saṃbhavantīti kalpayanti tatpūrveṇaivāṇuvādanirākaraṇena nirākṛtaṃ bhavatītyato na pṛthaktannirākaraṇāya prayatyate // 33 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:4557: saptānāṃstitvādīnāṃ bhaṅgānāṃ samāhāraḥ saptabhaṅgī tasyā nayo nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4559: muktakacchamate niraste muktāmbarāṇāṃ mataṃ buddhisthaṃ bhavati tannirasyata iti prasaṅgasaṅgatimāha-nirasta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4560: ekarūpaṃ brahmeti vaidikasiddhāntasyānaikāntavādena virodho 'sti na veti tadvādasya
GSP33brssgo2u:4586: tatra jñānāvaraṇīyaṃ darśanāvaraṇīyaṃ mohanīyamantarāyaṃ ceti ghātikarmāṇi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4592: athāghātīni catvāri karmāṇi vedanīyaṃ nāmikaṃ gotrikamāyuṣkamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4595: ahamatra bhavato deśikasyārhataḥ śiṣyavaṃśe praviṣṭo 'smītyabhimāno gotrikam,
GSP33brssgo2u:4599: śaktasya tasya dravībhāvātmakakalalāvasthāyā budbudāvasthāyāścārambhakaḥ kriyāviśeṣo nāmikaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4609: ghaṭāderhi sarvātmanā sadaikarūpatve prāpyātmanāpyastyeva sa iti tatprāptaye yatno na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4620: krameṇobhayavāñchāyāṃ syādasti ca nāsti ceti tṛtīyo bhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4621: yugapadubhayavāñchāyāmasti nāstīti śabdadvayasya sakṛdvakttumaśakyatvāt syādavaktavya iti caturtho bhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4624: tṛtīyacaturthecchāyāṃ syādasti cāvaktavyaśceti saptamo bhaṅga iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4625: evamekatvamanekatvaṃ ceti dvayamādāya syādekaḥ syādeko 'nekaśca syādavaktavyaḥ syādeko vaktavyaḥ syādaneko 'vaktavyaḥ syādeko 'nekaścāvaktavyaśceti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4628: ekarūpatve sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadāstyeveti vyavahāravilopāpattiḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:4630: yadasti tat sarvatra sarvadāstyeva yathā brahmātmā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4631: na caivaṃ tatprāptaye yatno na syāditi vācyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:4646: kiñca jīvādipadārthānāṃ saptatvaṃ jīvatvādirūpaṃ cāstyeva nāstyeveti ca niyatamutāniyatam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4652: dvitīye tasya saṃśayatvaṃ syādityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4655: ityevaṃ sarvatrānirdhāraṇe satyupadeśo niṣkampapravṛttiśca na syādityāha-evaṃsatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4657: yaduktamavaktavyatvaṃ tat kiṃ kenāpi śabdenāvācyatvamuta sakṛdanekaśabdāvācyatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4664: na cārthasya yugapadviruddhadharmavāñchāyāṃ vakturmūkatvamātramavaktavyapadena vivakṣitamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4673: ananuṣṭhānādbadhyanta ityārhatatantrāvadhṛtasvabhāvānāṃ trividhajīvānāṃ traividhyaniyamo 'pi na syādityāha-anādīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4683: yathaikasmindharmiṇi viruddhadharmāsaṃbhavo doṣaḥ syādvāde prasakta evamātmano 'pi jīvasyākārtsnyamaparo doṣaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4686: śarīraparimāṇatāyāṃ ca satyāmakṛtsno 'sarvagataḥ paricchinna ātmetyato ghaṭādivadanityatvamātmanaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4687: śarīrīṇāṃ cānavasthitaparimāṇatvānmanuṣyajīvo manuṣyaśarīraparimāṇo bhūtvā punaḥ kenacitkarmavipākena hastijanma prāpnuvanna kṛtsnaṃ hastiśarīraṃ vyāpnuyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4688: puttikājanma ca prāpmuvanna kṛtsnaḥ puttikāśarīre saṃmīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4689: samāna eṣa ekasminnapi janmani kaumārayauvanasthavireṣu doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4691: antāvayavo jīvastasya ta evāvayavā alpe śarīre saṃkuceyurmahati ca vikuceyuriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4692: teṣāṃ punaranantānāṃ jīvāvayavānāṃ samānadeśatvaṃ pratihanyate vā naveti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4706: kiñca bāladehamātra ātmā tataḥ sthūle yuvadehe kvacit syāditi kṛtsnadehaḥ sajīvo na syādityāha-samāna iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4707: yathā dīpāvayavānāṃ ghaṭe saṃkoco gehe vikāsastathā jīvāvayavānāmiti dehamānatvaniyamaṃ śaṅkate-syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4708: dīpāṃśavajjīvāṃśā bhinnadeśā ekadeśā veti vikalpyādye 'lpadehādbahirapi jīvaḥ syāditi dūṣayati-teṣāmityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4709: dīpasya tu na ghaṭādbahiḥ sattvamadhikāvayavānāṃ vināśāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4714: atha prayāyeṇa bṛhaccharīrapratipattau kecijjīvāvayavā upagacchanti tanuśarīrapratipattau ca kecidapagacchantītyucyeta tatrāpyucyate-
GSP33brssgo2u:4715: na ca paryāyād apy avirodho vikārādibhyaḥ / BBs_2,2.35 /
GSP33brssgo2u:4719: avayavopagamāpagamābhyāṃ hyaniśamāpūryamāṇasyāpakṣīyamāṇasya ca jīvasya vikriyāvattvaṃ tāvadaparihāryam,
GSP33brssgo2u:4721: tataśca bandhamokṣābhyupagamo bādhyeta karmāṣṭakapariveṣṭitasya jīvasyālābuvatsaṃsārasāgare nimagnasya bandhanocchedādūrdhvagāmitvaṃ bhavatīti
GSP33brssgo2u:4727: āgacchantaścaite jīvāvayavāḥ kutaḥ prādurbhavantyapagacchantaśca kva vā līyanta iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4730: nāpi kaścidanyaḥ sādhāraṇo 'sādhāraṇo vā jīvānāmavayavādhāro nirūpyate pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4736: coditāyāṃ punaḥ paryāyeṇa parimāṇānavasthāne 'pi srotaḥsaṃtānanityatānyāyenātmano nityatā syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4737: yathā raktapaṭānāṃ vijñānānavasthāne 'pi tatsaṃtānanityatā tadvaddhisicāmapītyāśaṅkyānena sūtreṇottaramucyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4742: evaṃ jīvāvayavā nityā itimate dehamānatvaṃ nirastam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4743: saṃprati jīvasya kecideva kūṭasthā avayavā anye tvāgamāpāyina iti śaṅkate-atheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4751: ādye kalpe doṣāntaraṃ vadan kalpāntaramādāya dūṣayati-kiñceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4755: kiñcātmana āgamāpāyiśīlāvayavatve sati kiyanta āyāntyavayavāḥ kiyanto 'payantītyajñānādātmaniścayābhāvādanirmokṣaḥ syādityāha-kiñceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4759: gotvavatpratyekaṃ samāptāvekasmiñcharīra ātmanānātvaṃ syādato na dehaparimāṇatvasāvayavatve ātmana ityupasaṃharati-ata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4766: sig vastraṃ vigataṃ yebhyaste visico digambarāsteṣāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4772: anatireke janmādivikāro vināśo muktyabhāva ityuktadoṣaprasaṅgāt saṃtānātmapakṣo 'nupapanna iti sūtrārthaḥ //35//
GSP33brssgo2u:4783: yaṃ sthūlaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā dehaṃ gṛhṇāti taddehaparimāṇa eva jīva iti niyamaṃ dūṣayati-antyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4805: yadi punaraviśeṣeṇeśvarakāraṇavādamātramiha pratiṣidhyeta pūrvottaravirodhādvyāhatābhivyāhāraḥ sūtrakāra ityetadāpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4806: tasmādaprakṛtiradhiṣṭhātā kevalaṃ nimittakāraṇamīśvara ityeṣa pakṣo vedāntavihitabrahmaikatvapratipakṣatvādyatnenātra pratiṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4808: kecittāvatsāṃkhyayogavyapāśrayāḥ kalpayanti pradhānapuruṣayoradhiṣṭhātā kevalaṃ nimittakāraṇamīśvara itaretaravilakṣaṇāḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvarā iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4809: māheśvarāstu manyante kāryakāraṇayogavidhiduḥkhāntāḥ pañca padārthāḥ paśupatineśvareṇa paśupāśavimokṣaṇāyopadiṣṭāḥ paśupatirīśvaro nimittakāraṇamiti varṇayanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4810: tathā vaiśeṣikādayo 'pi kecitkathañcitsvaprakriyānusāreṇa nimittakāraṇamīśvara iti varṇayanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4823: nahi kaścidadoṣaprayuktaḥ svārthe parārthe vā pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4824: svārthaprayukta eva ca sarvo janaḥ parārthe 'pi pravartata ityevamapyasāmañjasyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4834: luñcitakeśamatanirasanānantaraṃ jaṭādhāriśaivamataṃ buddhisthaṃ nirākriyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatimāha-idānīmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4835: sāmānyata īśvaranirāsa evātra kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkate-taditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4839: advitīyabrahmaprakṛtikaṃ jagaditi vadato vedāntasamanvayasya kartaiveśvaro naprakṛtiriti
GSP33brssgo2u:4840: śaivādimatena virodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe tanmatasya mānamūlatvādvirodhe sati vedāntoktadvayabrahmāsiddhiriti
GSP33brssgo2u:4874: tathāca loke yādṛśāḥ kartāro dṛṣṭāntādṛśā eva jagatkartāro rāgadveṣādimantaḥ sidhyeyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4875: yadi loke vicitraprāsādādikarturekatvādyadarśane 'pi jagatkartari lāghavādekatvaṃ nityajñānaṃ nirdeṣatvaṃ ca kalpyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:4880: asmākaṃ tvapauruṣeyatayā svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvayā śrutyā svaprameyabodhane dṛṣṭāntānapekṣayā bhavatyeva laukikakartṛviparītādvitīyakartrupādānātmakasarvajñanirdeṣeśvaranirṇayaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:4881: nirṇīte ca tasmin dharmigrāhakamānabādhānna rāgādidoṣāpādānasyāvakāśa ityānumānikeśvaravādibhyo vaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4883: yadi karturupādānatvamadṛṣṭatvānna kalpyate tarhi nirdeṣatvasyāpyadṛṣṭatvādyo viṣamakārī sa doṣavāniti vyāptidṛṣṭeśca jagatkartā doṣavān syāt
GSP33brssgo2u:4890: yathā śabdo yadi kṛtakatvena hetunā ghaṭavadanityaḥ syāttarhi tenaiva hetunā sāvayavo 'pi syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4891: na hyanityatvasya vyāpakaṃ sāvayavatvaṃ gandhādau vyabhicārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4892: nanu prāṇikarmaprerita īśvaro viṣamaphalān prāṇinaḥ karoti na svecchayeti śaṅkate-prāṇīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4895: atītakarmaṇā prerita īśvaro vartamānaṃ karma tatphalāya prerayatītyanāditvātpreryaprerakabhāvasya nānupapattiriti śaṅkate-nānāditvāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4899: tato 'pyatītakarmapreriteśvarapreritaṃ tadeveśvaraṃ vartamāne karmaṇi phaladānāya prerayati cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:4902: yattu phaladāne īśvarasya karma nimittamātraṃ na prerakamiti noktadoṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4915: udāsīnaḥ pravartaka iti ca vyāhṛtamiti yogānpratyāha-puruṣeti //37//
GSP33brssgo2u:4929: apicāgamabalena brahmavādī kāraṇādisvarūpaṃ nirūpayatīti nāvaśyaṃ tasya yathādṛṣṭameva sarvamabhyupagantavyamiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4930: parasya tu dṛṣṭāntabalena kāraṇādisvarūpaṃ nirūpayato yathādṛṣṭameva sarvamabhyupagantavyamityayamastyatiśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4937: sa ca saṃyegaḥ samavāyo vā nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4938: kāryabalāt preraṇayogyātvākhyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpyatāmityata āha-nāpyanya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4939: īśvarapreritapradhānakāryaṃ jagaditi siddhaṃ cet saṃbandhakalpanā syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4955: sa hi parikalpyamānaḥ kumabhakāra iva mṛdādīni pradhānādīnyadhiṣṭhāya pravartayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:4957: nahyapratyakṣaṃ rūpādihīnaṃ ca pradhānamīśvarasyādhiṣṭheyaṃ saṃbhavati mṛdādivailakṣaṇyāt // 39 //
GSP33brssgo2u:4967: yathā karaṇagrāmaṃ cakṣurādikamapratyakṣaṃ rūpādihīnaṃ ca puruṣo 'dhitiṣṭhatyevaṃ pradhānamapīśvaro 'dhiṣṭhāsyatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4973: sādhiṣṭhāno hi loke saśarīro rājā rāṣṭrasyeśvaro dṛśyate na niradhiṣṭhānaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4974: ataśca taddṛṣṭāntavaśenādṛṣṭamīśvaraṃ kalpayitumicchata īśvarasyapi kiñciccharīraṃ karaṇāyatanaṃ varṇayitavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4980: atha lokadarśanānusāreṇeśvarasyāpi kiñcitkāraṇānāmāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ kāmena kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4991: naca yadyenādhiṣṭheyaṃ tattadīyabhogahetutve sati pratyakṣamiti vyatirekavyāptau karaṇeṣu vyabhicāratādavasthyamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4999: īśvare tu pradhānakṛtāste na dṛśyanta ityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5004: yaḥ pravartakaścetanaḥ sa śarīrīti loke vyāptidṛṣṭerīśvarasya ca śarīrānupapatterna pravartakatvamiti sūtrārthamāha-itaśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5009: naca nityaṃ śarīraṃ sargātprāgapi saṃbhavatīti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5012: jīvasyaiva śarīraṃ bhautikamīśvarasya tu svecchānirmitaṃ prāgapi syādityāśaṅkāṃ nirasyati-karaṇavaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:5021: anantaṃ ca pradhānamanantāśca puruṣā mitho bhinnā abhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5022: tatra sarvajñeśvareṇa pradhānasya puruṣāṇāmātmanaśceyattā paricchidyeta vā na vā paricchidyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5026: yaddhi loka iyattāparicchinnaṃ vastu paṭādi tadantavaddṛṣṭaṃ tathā pradhānapuruṣeśvaratrayamapīyattāparicchinnatvādantavatsyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5030: tataśceyattāparicchinnānāṃ madhye ye saṃsāriṇaḥ saṃsārānmucyante teṣāṃ saṃsāro 'ntavānsaṃsāritvaṃ ca teṣāmantavat /
GSP33brssgo2u:5031: evamitareṣvapi krameṇa mucyamāneṣu saṃsārasya saṃsāriṇāṃ cāntavattvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5032: pradhānaṃ ca savikāraṃ puruṣārthamīśvarasyādhiṣṭheyaṃ saṃsāritvenābhimataṃ tacchūnyatāyāmīśvaraḥ kimadhitiṣṭhet /
GSP33brssgo2u:5036: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpo 'bhyupagamyeta na pradhānasya puruṣāṇāmātmanaśceyatteśvareṇa paricchidyata iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:5040: evamīśvarasya śuṣkatarkeṇa kartṛtvanirṇayo netyupapādya nityatvasarvajñatvanirṇayo 'pi na saṃbhavatītyāha sūtrakāraḥ-antavatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5045: yadyapi saṃkhyāvatvamātraṃ hetuḥ saṃbhavati tathāpi sarvajñaniścayena hetvasiddhinirāsaṃ dyotayituṃ niścitapadam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5052: nanu pradhānapuruṣeśvarāstraya iti jñāte 'pi jīvānāmānantyātkathaṃ saṃkhyāniścayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5057: māṣarāśivatkeṣāñcijjīvānāṃ saṃghastadbandhaśca naśyedityevaṃ sarvamukteridānīṃ śūnyaṃ jagatsyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5070: tasmāt kevalakartrīśvaravādasya nirmūlatvānna tartrupādānādvayeśvarasamanvayavirodha iti siddham //41//
GSP33brssgo2u:5076: yeṣāṃ punaḥ prakṛtiścādhiṣṭhātā cobhayātmakaṃ kāraṇamīśvaro 'bhimatasteṣāṃ pakṣaḥ pratyākhyāyayate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5077: nanu śrutisamāśrayaṇenāpyevaṃrūpa eveśvaraḥ prāṅnirdhāritaḥ prakṛtiścādhiṣṭhātā ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5083: sa caturdhātmānaṃ pravibhajya pratiṣṭhito vāsudevavyūharūpeṇa saṃkarṣaṇavyūharūpeṇa pradyumnavyūharūpeṇāniruddhavyūharūpeṇa ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:5088: teṣāṃ vāsudevaḥ parā parakṛtiritare saṃkarṣaṇādayaḥ kāryam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5089: tamitthaṃbhūtaṃ parameśvaraṃ bhagavantamabhigamanopādānejyāsvādhyāyayogairvarṣaśatamiṣṭvā kṣīṇakleśo bhagavantameva pratipadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5090: tatra yattāvaducyeta yo 'sau nārāyaṇaḥ paro 'vyaktātprasiddhaḥ paramātmā sarvātmā sa ātmānātmānamanekadhā vyūhyāvasthita iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:5097: yatpunaridamucyate vāsudevātsaṃkarṣaṇa utpadyate saṃkarṣaṇācca pradyumnaḥ pradyumnāccāniruddha iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5098: atra brūmaḥ - na vāsudevasaṃjñakātparamātmanaḥ saṃkarṣaṇasaṃjñakasya jīvasyotpattiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5114: vedāviruddhāṃśamaṅgīkṛtya vedaviruddhaṃ jīvotpattyaṃśaṃ nirākartumadhikaraṇārambha ityāha-ucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5116: sa kiṃ jīvotpattyādyaṃśe mānaṃ naveti saṃdehe bādhānupalambhānmānamiti pūrvapakṣayati-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5124: yathoktavyūhavantaṃ sarvaprakṛtiṃ nirañjanaṃ vijñānarūpaṃ paramātmānamiti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:5141: yasmānna hi loke karturdevadattādeḥ karaṇaṃ paraśvādyutpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5142: varṇayanti ca bhāgavatāḥ karturjīvātsaṃkarṣaṇasaṃjñakātkaraṇaṃ manaḥ pradyumnasaṃjñakamutpadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5146: jīvasyotpattiṃ nirasya jīvānmanasa utpattiṃ nirasyati-naca karturiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5147: yasmāt kartuḥ karaṇotpattirna dṛśyate tasmādasaṃgatā kalpanetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5148: siddhānāṃ karaṇānāṃ prayoktā karteti prasiddhyartho hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5150: nanu loke kaścicchilpivaraḥ kuṭhāraṃ nirmāya tena vṛkṣaṃ chinattīti dṛṣṭamiti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:5154: vinaiva karaṇaṃ kartṛtve vā manovaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ //43//
GSP33brssgo2u:5158: athāpi syānna caite saṃkarṣaṇādayo jīvādibhāvenābhipreyante kiṃ tarhīśvarā evaite
GSP33brssgo2u:5160: vāsudevā evaite sarve nirdeṣā niradhiṣṭhāna niravadyāśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5162: atrocyate- evamapi tadapratiṣedha utpattyasaṃbhavasyāpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnotyevāmutpattyasaṃbhavo doṣaḥ prakārāntareṇetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5164: yadi tāvadayamabhiprāyaḥ parasparabhinnā evaite vāsudevādayaścatvāra īśvarāstulyadharmāṇo naiṣāmekātmakatvamastīti,
GSP33brssgo2u:5169: athāyamabhiprāya ekasyaiva bhagavata ete catvāro vyūhāstulyadharmāṇa iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:5171: nahi vāsudevātsaṃkarṣaṇasyotpattiḥ saṃbhavati saṃkarṣaṇācca pradyumnasya pradyumnāccāniruddhasya,
GSP33brssgo2u:5176: vāsudevā eva hi sarve vyūhā nirviśeṣā iṣyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:5196: kiṃ catvāraḥ svatantrā bhinnā eva utaikasya vikāratvenābhinnāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5198: dvitīye vikārāḥ prakṛtitulyā vā nyūnā vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:5201: yadi nyūnā api bhagavato vyūhāstadā catuṣṭvavyāghāta ityāha-nacaita iti //44//
GSP33brssgo2u:5209: caturṣu vedeṣu paraṃ śreyo 'labdhvā śāṇḍilya idaṃ śāstramadhigatavānityādivedanindādarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5213: ādipadāt pradyumnāniruddhau bhinnāvātmana ityuktvātmana evaite iti viruddhoktigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5218: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 2
GSP33brssgo2u:5219: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brssgo2u:5220: iti śrīparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brssgo2u:5221: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brssgo2u:5230: vedānteṣu tatra tatra bhinnaprasthānā utpattiśrutaya upalabhyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:5238: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadākāśamāśritya cintyate kimasyākāśasyotpattirastyuta nāstīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5247: iti ca pañcānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ madhyamaṃ teja ādiṅkṛtvā trayāṇāṃ tejobannānāmutpattiḥ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5256: yathā mithovirodhāt pūrvāparavirodhācca parapakṣā upekṣyāstathā śrutipakṣo 'pi upekṣya iti śaṅkotthāne pādadvayasyārambhāt pūrvapādena dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatiriti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5259: jīvasya prāṇānāṃ cotpattiṃ 'sarva eta ātmano vyuccaranti'iti vājinaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5269: saṃdehe yadyutpattistadā vākyabhedena virodhādaprāmāṇyamanayoḥ śrutyoriti pūrvapakṣayiṣyannādāvanutpattikṣamekadeśi
GSP33brssgo2u:5278: taittirīyakā hi samāmananti- 'satyaṃ jñānamantaṃ brahma' iti prakṛtya 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5288: nanu sakṛcchrutasyāpi kartuḥ kartavyadvayena saṃbandho dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:5292: prathamajatvaṃ hi chāndogye tejaso 'vagamyate taittirīyake cākāśasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:5296: ityatrāpi tasmādākāśaḥ saṃbhūtastasmāttejaḥ saṃbhūtamiti sakṛcchrutasyāpādānasya saṃbhavanasya ca viyattejobhyāṃ yugapatsaṃbandhānupapatteḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:5302: ekasya yugapatkāryadvayāsaṃbandhe 'pi krameṇa saṃbandhasaṃbhavādekavākyateti mukhyasiddhāntī śaṅkate-nanu sakṛditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:5310: kiñca satpadārtha ātmā chāndogye tejasa upādānaṃ śrūyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:5317: yā tvitarā viyadutpattivādinī śrutirudāhṛtā sā gauṇī bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5323: dravyasya caikajātīyakamanekaṃ ca dravyaṃ samavāyikāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5325: yasminsamavāyikāraṇe satyasamavāyikāraṇe ca tatsaṃyoga ākāśa utpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5327: utpattimatāṃ ca tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ pūrvottarakāyorviśeṣaḥ saṃbhāvyate prāgutpatteḥ prakāśādikāryaṃ na babhūva paścācca bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5331: tasmādyathā loka ākāśaṃ kurvākāśo jāta ityevañjātīyako gauṇaḥ prayogo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5332: yathāca ghaṭākāśaḥ karakākāśo gṛhākāśa ityekasyāpyākāśasyaivañjātīyako bhedavyapadeśo gauṇo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5335: evaṃ śrutyorvirodhādaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣe prāpte sa eva viyadanutpattivādi svamatena prāmāṇyaṃ brūta ityāha-asminniti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5336: evamādhyāyasamāpteradhikaraṇeṣu prathamaṃ virodhācchrutyaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ tata ekadeśisiddhāntaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5337: paścānmukhyasiddhānte śrutīnāmavirodhenaika vākyatayā brahmaṇi samanvayasiddhiriti phalaṃ kramaścetyavagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5343: saṃyoga eva hi dravyasyāsamavāyikāraṇamataḥ samavāyyasamavāyinorabhāvānna hetvasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5364: ākāśavatsarvagataśca nityaḥ iti cākāśena brahma sarvagatatvanityatvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāmupamimāna ākāśasyāpi tau dharmau sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5366: 'sa yathānanto 'yamākāśa evamananta ātmā veditavyaḥ' iti codāharaṇam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5382: kathaṃ punarekasya saṃbhūtaśabdasya 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:5383: ityasminnadhikāre pareṣu tejaḥprabhṛtiṣvanuvartamānasya mukhyatvaṃ saṃbhavatyākāśe ca gauṇatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5384: ata uttaramucyate- syāccaikasyāpi saṃbhūtaśabdasya viṣayaviśeṣavaśādgauṇo mukhyasya prayogo brahmaśabdavat /
GSP33brssgo2u:5387: ityasminnadhikāre 'nnādiṣu gauṇaḥ prayoga ānande ca mukhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5388: yathā ca tapasi brahmavijñānasādhane brahmaśabdo bhaktyā prayujyate 'ñjasā tu vijñeye brahmaṇi tadvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:5391: nanu nabhasā dvitīyena sadvitīyaṃ brahma prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5392: kathaṃ ca brahmaṇi vidite sarvaṃ viditaṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:5394: yathā loke kaścitkumbhakārakule pūrvedyurmṛddaṇḍacakrādīni copalabhyāparedyuśca nānāvidhānyamatrāṇi
GSP33brssgo2u:5395: prasāritānyupalabhya brūyānmṛdevaikākinī pūrvedyurāsīditi sa ca tayāvadhāraṇayā mṛtkāryajātameva
GSP33brssgo2u:5398: yathā mṛdo 'matraprakṛteḥ kumbhakāro 'dhiṣṭhātā dṛśyate naivaṃ brahmaṇo jagatprakṛteranyo 'dhikṛtāstīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5399: naca nabhasāpi dvitīyena sadvitīyaṃ brahma prasajyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5402: sargakāle tu brahma jagadutpādayituṃ yatate stimitamitaravattiṣṭati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5409: ato brahmaṇā tatkāryeṇa ca vijñātena sahavijñātamevākāśaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5410: yathā kṣīrapūrṇe ghaṭe katicidabbindavaḥ prakṣiptāḥ santaḥ kṣīragrahaṇenaiva gṛhītā bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:5447: iti, 'ātmani khalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāta idaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' (bṛ. 4.5.6)
GSP33brssgo2u:5448: iti, 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati' (muṇḍa. 1.1.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:5449: iti, 'na kācana maddhahirdhā vidyāsti' iti caivaṃrūpā prativedāntaṃ pratijñā vijñāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5452: vyatireke hi satyekavijñānena sarvaṃ vijñāyata itīyaṃ pratijñā hrīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5453: sa cāvyatireka evamupapadyate yadi kṛtsnaṃ vastujātamekasmādbrahmaṇa utpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5455: tathāhi- 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' iti pratijñāya mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaiḥ kāryakāraṇābhedapratipādanaparaiḥ pratijñaiṣā samarthyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5459: ityevaṃ kāryajātaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pradarśyāvyatirekaṃ pradarśayanti- 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvam' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssgo2u:5461: tadyadyākāśaṃ na brahmakāryaṃ syānna brahmaṇi vijñāta ākāśaṃ vijñāyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:5464: tathāhi- prativedāntaṃ te te śabdāstena tena dṛṣṭāntena tāmeva pratijñāṃ khyapayanti 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' (bṛ. 2.4.6)
GSP33brssgo2u:5470: viyadutpattiviṣayaśrutyantarasya darśitatvāt 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5478: tejaḥsargasya taittirīyake tṛtīyatvaśravaṇāt 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5482: śakyā tu pariṇetuṃ chāndogyaśrutistadākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā 'tattejo 'sṛjata' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5483: nahīyaṃ śrutistejojanipradhānā satī śrutyantaraprasiddhāmākāśasyotpattiṃ vārayituṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5487: nacāsmābhiḥ sakṛcchrutasya sraṣṭuḥ sraṣṭavyadvayasaṃbandho 'bhipreyate śrutyantaravaśena sraṣṭavyāntaropasaṃgrahāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5489: ityatra sākṣādeva sarvasya vastujātasya brahmajatvaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na pradeśāntaravihitaṃ tejaḥpramukhamutpattikramaṃ vārayati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5490: evaṃ tejaso 'pi brahmajatvaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na śrutyantaravihitaṃ nabhaḥpramukhamutpattikramaṃ vārayitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5498: nahi tejaḥprāthamyānurodhena śrutyantaraprasiddho viyatpadārthaḥ parityaktavyo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5500: apica 'tattejo 'sṛjata' iti nātra kramasya vācakaḥ kaścicchabdo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5502: sa ca 'vāyoragniḥ' ityanena śrutyantaraprasiddhena krameṇa nivāryate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5505: apica chāndogye 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' ityetāṃ pratijñāṃ vākyopakrame śrutāṃ samarthayitumasamāmnātamapi viyadutpattāvupasaṃkhyātavyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5506: kimaṅga punastaittirīyake samāmnātaṃ nabho na saṃgṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5507: yaccoktamākāśasya sarveṇānanyadeśakālatvādbrahmaṇā tatkāryaiśca saha viditameva tadbhavatyato na pratijñā hīyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:5513: kṣīrodakanyāyena ca sarvavijñānaṃ kalpyamānaṃ na samyagvijñānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5518: naca svakāryāpekṣayedaṃ vastvekadeśaviṣayaṃ sarvavijñānamekamevādvitīyatāvadhāraṇaṃ ceti nyāyyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5519: mṛdādiṣvapi hi tatsaṃbhavānna tadapūrvavadupanyasitavyaṃ bhavati 'śvetaketo yannu
GSP33brssgo2u:5520: somyedaṃ mahāmanā anūcānamānī stabdho 'syuta tamādeśamaprākṣyo 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:5522: tasmādaśeṣavastuviṣayamevedaṃ sarvavijñānaṃ sarvasya brahmakāryatāpekṣayopanyasyata iti draṣṭavyam // 6 //
GSP33brssgo2u:5523: evamākāśasyānutpattau sarvaśrutīnāmavirodha ityekadeśisiddhāntaḥ prāptastaṃ mukhyasiddhāntī dūṣayati-pratijñeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5529: tathāpi jīvādivadanutpannasyāpi nabhaso brahmaṇi kalpitatvenāvyatirekātpratijñāsiddhiḥ kiṃ na syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:5537: tasmātpratijñāsiddhaye ākāśasya kāryatvenaivāvyatireko vācya iti dṛṣṭāntasṛṣṭisārvātmyaśabdānāha-tathā hīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5542: evamākāśotpattikathanādekadeśimate dūṣite śrutyaprāmāṇyavādī svoktaṃ smārayati-satyaṃ darśitamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5547: vastuni vikalpāsaṃbhavena tayoḥ śākhābhedena prāthamyavyavasthāyā ayogāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:5548: naikavākyateti prāpte mukhya eva dūṣayati-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5563: nanvekasya sraṣṭuranekārthasaṃbandhavadvākyasyāpyanekārthatā kiṃ na syādityata ā-sraṣṭā tviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5566: nānārthakaprayoge tu paya ānayetyādāvāvṛttyā vākyabheda eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:5569: ekasya śabdasyāvṛttiṃ vinānekārthatvaṃ nāsti cedasṛjateti śabdasya chāndogya upasaṃhṛtākāśādisaṃbandhārthamāvṛttidoṣaḥ syādityata āha-naceti
GSP33brssgo2u:5573: śrutyantarasthaḥ kramaḥ śrutyantare grāhya ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-yathāceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5575: tejaḥprāthamyasvīkāre ākāśasargo dharmi taddharmaḥ prāthamyaṃ ceti dvayaṃ śrutaṃ bādhanīyamiti gauravam,
GSP33brssgo2u:5576: ākāśaprāthamye tvārthikatejaḥ sargaprāthamyamātrabādha iti lāghavamiti matvāha-netyucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5577: kiñca pradhānadharmityāgādvaraṃ guṇabhūtasya tejaḥprāthamyasya dharmasya tyāga ityāha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5578: kiñca kiṃ sṛṣṭiparaśrutisiddhatvāttejaḥprāthamyaṃ gṛhyata uta prathamasthāne tejasaḥ sargaśrutyārthātprāthamyabhānāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5581: yaduktaṃ vastuni vikalpāsaṃbhavādubhayoḥ prāthamyaṃ śākhābhedena vyavasthitaṃ na bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5586: viyadanutpattivādinoktamanūdya pratijñāyā advitīyaśruteśca mukhyārthatātparyāvagamānna gauṇārthateti dūṣayati-yaccoktamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:5588: udakaṃ kṣīrasthamapi kṣīrajñānānna gṛhyate bhedāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5594: ubhayagauṇatve 'dbhutavadupanyāso mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaistatsādhanaṃ ca na syāditi doṣāntaramāha-nacetyādinā //6//
GSP33brssgo2u:5602: yato yāvatkiñcidvikārajātaṃ dṛśyate ghaṭaghaṭikodañcanādi vā kaṭakakeyūrakuṇḍalādi vā sūcīnārācanistriṃśādi vā tāvāneva vibhāgo loke lakṣyate
GSP33brssgo2u:5607: nanvātmāpyākāśādibhyo vibhakta iti tasyāpi kāryatvaṃ ghaṭādivatprāpnoti / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:5609: yadi hyātmāpi vikāraḥ syāttasmātparamanyanna śrutamityākāśādi sarvaṃ kāryaṃ nirātmakamātmanaḥ kāryatve syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5619: āgantukaṃ hi vastu nirākriyate na svarūpam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5620: ya eva hi nirākartā tadeva tasya svarūpam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5625: tathā bhasmībhavatyapi dehe cātmana ucchedo vartamānasvabhāvādanyathāsvabhāvatvaṃ vā na saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5628: tatpratyucyate- na tāvatsamānajātīyamevārabhate na bhinnajātīyamiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5633: samavāyikāraṇaviṣaya eva samānajātīyatvābhyupagamo na kāraṇāntaraviṣaya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5641: ekaiko hi paramāṇirmanaścāyaṃ karmārabhate na dravyāntaraiḥ saṃhatyetyabhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5644: bhavedeṣa niyamo yadi saṃyogasacivaṃ dravyaṃ dravyāntarasyārambhakamabhyupagamyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5645: tadeva tu dravyaṃ viśeṣavadavasthāntaramāpadyamānaṃ kāryaṃ nāmābhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5651: yaccoktamākāśasyotpattau na pūrvottarakālayorviśeṣaḥ saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5653: yenaiva hi viśeṣeṇa pṛthivyādibhyo vyatiricyamānaṃ nabhaḥ svarūpavadidānīmadhyavasīyate sa eva viśeṣaḥ prāgutpatternāsīditi gamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5654: yathā ca brahma na sthūlādibhiḥ pṛthivyādisvabhāvaiḥ svabhāvavat,
GSP33brssgo2u:5670: 'ākāśavatsarvagataśca nityaḥ' ityapi prasiddhamahattvenākāśenopamānaṃ kriyate niratiśayamahattvāya nākāśasamatvāya /
GSP33brssgo2u:5671: yatheṣuriva savitā dhāvatīti kṣipragatitvāyocyate neṣutulyagatitvāya tadvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:5682: kāryameva vastvekadeśa ākāśo notpadyate sāmagrīśūnyatvādityatra ākāśo vikāraḥ vibhaktatvāt ghaṭādivaditi satpratipakṣamāha-yatpunarityādinā
GSP33brssgo2u:5683: yo vibhaktaḥ sa vikāra ityanvayamuktvā yastvavikāraḥ sa na vibhakto yathātmeti vyatirikavyāptimāha-na tvavikṛtamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5687: dharmisamānasattākavibhāgasya hetutvātparamārthātmani vibhāgasya kalpitatvena bhinnasattākatvānna vyabhicāra ityāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5693: ghaṭavadityābhāsatulyamidamanumānamityāśaṅkyātmanaḥ paramakāraṇatvena śrutasya kāryatve śūnyatāprasaṅga iti bādhakasattvāttasyābhāvatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5694: nātra kiñcidbādhakamasti pratyuta ākāśasyākāryatve nityānekadravyakalpanā śrautapratijñāhānyādayo bādhakāḥ santīti nābhāsatulyatetyāha-ātmana iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5697: ādye yo jñātā sa pariśiṣyata iti na śūnyatā /
GSP33brssgo2u:5704: yaduktaṃ sureśvarācāryaiḥ-'pramātā ca pramāṇaṃ ca prameyaṃ pramitistathā /
GSP33brssgo2u:5711: nanu prameyasyāpi svaprakāśatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5713: ātmāpi mānādhīnasiddhikaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-ātmā tviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5715: gehe ghaṭo dṛṣṭo na veti jñānasaṃśaye na dṛṣṭa iti vyatirekaniścaye cārthasvarūpaniścayāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5723: svaprakāśasyāpi bādhaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5724: jaḍaṃ hi parāyattaprakāśatvādāgantukaṃ bādhayogyaṃ na prakāśātmasvarūpaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5727: nahi sunipuṇenāpi svābhāvo draṣṭuṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5728: evaṃ svataḥ sphūrtitvādātmā na bādhya ityuktvā svataḥ sattākatvācca na bādhya ityāha-tathāhameveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5729: jñānajñeyayoḥ sattāvyabhicāre 'pi jñātuḥ sadaikarūpatvānna sattāvyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5733: anyathāsvabhāvatvaṃ mithyātvaṃ vā saṃbhāvayitumapi na śakyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:5752: yadyapyadṛṣṭavadātmasaṃyukte aṇumanasī ādyakarmārambhake tathāpi karmasamavāyina ekatvādanekatvaniyamabhaṅga ityāha-ekaiko hīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5756: na tvabhyupagamyate tasmānnaiṣa niyama iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5757: yattu kṣīraparamāṇuṣu rasāntarotpattau taireva dadhyārambha iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5762: loke kartu- sahāyadarśanādasahāyādbrahmaṇaḥ kathaṃ sarga iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:5770: na hyākāśābhāvastaddharmo vā kāṭhinyaṃ kintu mūrtadravyaviśeṣastasaṃyogaviśeṣo vā kāṭhinyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5782: sarvamūrtadravyasaṃyogaḥ parimāṇaviśeṣo vā vibhutvaṃ nirguṇātmani dṛṣṭānte nāsti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5792: nanu 'sa yathānanto 'yamākāśa evamananta ātmā'iti śrutirnityatvenaiva sāmyaṃ brūte,
GSP33brssgo2u:5803: balavattittiriśrutyā chāndogyaśruternayanādekavākyatayā sraṣṭari brahmātmani samanvaya ityupasaṃharati-tasmāditi //7//
GSP33brssgo2u:5822: nanu vāyorākāśasya ca tulyayorutpattiprakaraṇe śravaṇāśravaṇayorekamevādhikaraṇamubhayaviṣayamastu kimatideśenāsati viśeṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5830: 'ākāśādvāyuḥ'iti śrutyā virodho 'sti na veti ekavākyatvabhāvābhāvabhyāṃ saṃśaye gauṇapakṣapūrvapakṣasiddhāntapakṣānatidiśati-tatrāpītyādinā
GSP33brssgo2u:5832: tatra vāyutejasostulyavadānantarye vāyoragniriti kramaśrutibādhātpaurvāparye tejaḥprāthamyabhaṅgānnaikavākyateti pūrvapakṣe gauṇavādyabhiprāyamāha-tataśceti
GSP33brssgo2u:5840: tathācākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā tejo 'sṛjateti śrutyorekavākyatayā brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5852: tathā vikārebhya evākāśādibhya uttareṣāṃ vikārāṇāmutpattimupaśrutyākāśasyāpi vikārādeva brahmaṇa utpattiriti kaścinmanyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5854: na khalu brahmaṇaḥ sadātmakasya kutaścidanyataḥ saṃbhava utpattirāśaṅkitavyā /
GSP33brssgo2u:5861: sāmānyāddhi viśeṣā utpadyamānā dṛśyante mṛdāderghaṭādayo natu viśeṣebhyaḥ sāmānyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5865: 'sa kāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaścijjanitā na cādhipaḥ' (śve. 6.9)
