GSP33brssgo2u:6786: yadyaṇvātmasaṃbandhasya tvagvyāptyā dehavyāpinī vedanā syāttarhyatiprasaṅga iti dūṣayati-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6791: naca siddhānte tvagātmasaṃbandhasya vyāpitvātkaṇṭakasaṃbandhe dehavyāpivedanāprasaṅga iti vācyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6793: na caivaṃ viṣayatvaksaṃbandha eva taddheturastu kimātmavyāptyeti vācyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6795: na caiṣāṃ vyāpakānāṃ kāryāṇāmalpamupādānaṃ saṃbhavati kāryasyopādānādviśleṣānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6806: pūrvaṃ caitanyasya guṇatvamupetya tadvyāptyā guṇyātmāṇutvaṃ nirastaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6809: 'antarā vijñānamanasī hṛdi hi'iti ca prakṛtā buddhiryogyatvāttacchabdena parāmṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:6812: akāryakāraṇadravyasamānādhikaraṇatayā tattvamasīti vākyasya so 'yamiti vākyavadakhaṇḍābhedārthatvādānantyaṃ satyamaṇutvamadhyastamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:6816: buddherguṇena nimittenātmanyadhyasto guṇo bhavati tenātmaguṇenādhyastenaivārāgraparimāṇo 'pakṛṣṭaśca jīvo dṛṣṭaḥ svatastvananta evetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:6817: 'na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate nāpi vācā nānyairdevaistapasā karmaṇā vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:6818: jñānaprasādena viśuddhasattvastatastu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ'ityuktvā 'eṣo 'ṇurātmā'ityuktaḥ para eva,
GSP33brssgo2u:6823: yadi caitanyaṃ prajñā tadā bhedopacāra ityāha-vyapadeśamātraṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6824: nanu caitanyaṃ guṇa iti bhedo mukhyo 'stu,
GSP33brssgo2u:6835: yāvadātmabhāvitvāc ca na doṣas taddarśanāt / BBs_2,3.30 /
GSP33brssgo2u:6842: yāvadeva cāyaṃ buddhyupādhisaṃbandhastāvajjīvasya jīvatvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:6852: tathāhi śāstraṃ darśayati- 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ sa samānaḥ sannubhau lokāvanusaṃcarati dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva' (bṛ. 4.3.4) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo2u:6853: tatra vijñānamaya iti buddhimaya ityetaduktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6854: pradeśāntare 'vijñānamayo manomayaḥ prāṇamayaścakṣurmayaḥ śrotramayaḥ' iti vijñānamayasya manaādibhiḥ saha pāṭhāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6856: yathā loke strīmayo devadatta iti strīrāgādipradhāno 'bhidhīyate tadvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:6857: 'sa samānaḥ sannubhau lokāvanusaṃcarati' iti ca lokāntaragamane 'pyaviyogaṃ buddhyā darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6862: dhyāyantyāṃ buddhau dhyāyatīva calantyāṃ buddhau calatīveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6864: naca mithyājñānasya samyagjñānādanyatra nivṛttirastītyato yāvadbrahmātmatānavabodhasyāvadayaṃ buddhyupādhisaṃbandho na śāmyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6865: darśayati ca- 'vedāhametaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntamādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ purastāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6866: tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' (śve. 3.8) iti // 30 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:6871: nanu svataḥ saṃsāritvamastu kiṃ buddhyupādhinetyata āha-yāvadeva cāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6872: samāno buddhitādātmyāpannaḥ san vijñānaṃ brahma tanmayo vikāro 'ṇurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6877: sati mūle kāryasya viyogāsaṃbhavācceti yuktyāpyāha-apica mithyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6885: 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:6890: yathā loke puṃstvādīni bījātmanā vidyamānānyeva bālyādiṣvanupalabhyamānānyavidyamānavadabhipreyamāṇāni yauvanādiṣvāvirbhavanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:6892: evamayamapi buddhisaṃbandhaḥ śaktyātmanā vidyamāna eva suṣuptapralayayoḥ punaḥ prabodhaprasavayorāvirbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6896: darśayati ca suṣuptādutthānamavidyātmakabījasadbhāvakāritam- 'sati saṃpadya na viduḥ sati saṃpadyamāha' iti ta iha vyāghro vā saṃho vā' (chā. 6.9.3) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:6905: svāpe bījātmanā sato buddhayādeḥ prabodhe 'bhivyaktirityatra śrutimāha-darśayatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6911: taccātmana upādhibhūtamantaḥkaraṇaṃ mano buddhirvijñānaṃ ctitamiti cānekadhā tatra tatrābhilapyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:6917: atha satyapi hetusamavadhāne phalābhāvastato nityamevānupalabdhiḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:6923: nahi tasya pūrvottarayoḥ kṣaṇayorapratibaddhaśaktikasya sato 'kasmācchaktiḥ pratibadhyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:6925: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'anyatrātmanā abhūvaṃ nādarśamanyatramanā abhūvaṃ nāśrauṣam' (bṛ. 1.5.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:6926: iti, 'manasā hyeva paśyati manasā śṛṇoti' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6927: kāmādayaścāsya vṛttaya iti darśayati 'kāmaḥ saṃkalpo vicikitsā śraddhāśraddhā dhṛtiradhṛtirhīrbhīrityetatsarvaṃ mana eva' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6935: ' 'cittaṃ ca cetayitavyam'iti tatra tatra śrutiṣu manaādipadavācyaṃ tāvadbuddhidravyaṃ prasiddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6938: garvavṛttiko 'haṅkāro vijñānaṃ citpradhānaṃ smṛtipradhānaṃ vā cittamityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6939: yadyapi sākṣipratyakṣasiddhamantaḥkaraṇaṃ śrutyanūditaṃ ca tathāpi pratyakṣaśrutyorvivadamānaṃ prati vyāsaṅgānupapattyā tatsādhayati-taccetyādinā
GSP33brssgo2u:6941: pañcendriyāṇāṃ pañcaviṣayasaṃbandhe sati nityaṃ yugapatpañcopalabdhayaḥ syuḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6945: nanu satyapi kāragrisaṃyoge dāhakādācitkatvavadupalabdhikādācitkatvamastu kiṃ manasetyāśaṅkyānyataraniyamo vetyetadvyācaṣṭe-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6946: satyāṃ sāmagryāṃ nityopalabdhirvāṅgīkāryā anyatarasya kāraṇasya kenapicchaktipratibandhaniyamo vāṅgīkāryaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6954: tathāhi-rasādīnāṃ sahopalabdhiprāptau rasabubhutsārūpo vyāsaṅgo rūpādyupalabdhipratibandhako vācyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6956: tatrātmano 'saṅganirguṇakūṭasthasya guṇitvāyogānmana eva guṇitvenaiṣṭavyamiti vyāsaṅgānupapattyā manaḥsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6961: teṣāṃ mate punaricchādīnāmātmadharmatvaṃ teṣāṃ mano durlabhamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6979: tathedamapi śāstramarthavadbhavati eṣa hi draṣṭā śrotā mantā boddhā kartā vijñānātmā puruṣaḥ (pra. 5.9) iti // 33 //
GSP33brssgo2u:6981: saṃprati tato bahiṣṭhaṃ kartṛtvaṃ sādhayati-kartā śāstrārthavattvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6982: sa nityaścidrūpo mahānātmā kartā na vetyasaṅgatvaśrutīnāṃ vidhyādiśrutīnāṃ ca vipratipattyā
GSP33brssgo2u:6992: nanu buddhikartṛtvena śāstrārthavattāstu kiṃ jīvakartṛtvena tatrāha-taddhi kartuḥ sata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6993: mayedaṃ kartavyamiti bodhasamarthasya cetanasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ vācyaṃ na tvacetanāyā buddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6994: kiṃ ca bhokturātmana eva kartṛtā vācyā 'śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari'iti nyāyāditi bhāvaḥ //33//
GSP33brssgo2u:6999: yajjīvaprakriyāyāṃ saṃdhye sthāne vihāramupadiśati- 'sa īyate 'mṛto yatra kāmam' (bṛ. 4.3.12)
GSP33brssgo2u:7000: iti, 'sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate' (bṛ. 2.1.18) iti ca // 34 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:7004: amṛtaḥ sa ātmā yatheṣṭamīyate gacchatīti vihāropadeśāt, ātmā kartā //34//
GSP33brssgo2u:7009: yajjīvaprakriyāyāmeva karaṇānāmupādānaṃ saṃkīrtayati- 'tadeṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya' (bṛ. 21.1.17)
GSP33brssgo2u:7011: FN: prāṇānāmindryāṇāṃ vijñānena buddhyā vijñānaṃ grahaṇaśaktimādāya svāpe jīvo hṛdayametīti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7012: prāṇānāṃ madhye vijñānena buddhyā vijñānasamarthamindriyajātamādāya śete iti prāṇān gṛhītvā parivartata iti upādānakartṛtvamātmanaḥ akartṛtve upādānānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ //35//
GSP33brssgo2u:7015: vyapadeśāc ca kriyāyāṃ na cen nirdeśaviparyayaḥ / BBs_2,3.36 /
GSP33brssgo2u:7017: yadasya laukikīṣu vaidikīṣu ca kriyāsu kartṛtvaṃ vyapadiśati śāstram- 'vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute karmāṇi tanute 'pi ca' (tai. 2.5.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7024: tathā hyanyatra buddhivivakṣāyāṃ vijñānaśabdasya karaṇavibhaktinirdeśo dṛśyate 'tadeṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya' (bṛ. 2.1.17) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7027: atrāha- yadi buddhivyatirikto jīvaḥ kartā syātsa svatantraḥ sanpriyaṃ hitaṃ caivātmano niyamena saṃpādayenna viparītam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7030: vijñānaśabdo jīvasya nirdeśo na cet tadā prathamānirdeśādviparyayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7032: tasmādiha śrutau tanuta ityākhyātena kartṛvācinā vijñānapadasya sāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśātkriyāyāmātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ sūcyata iti sūtrabhāṣyayorarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:7037: yathāyamātmopalabdhiṃ prati svatantro 'pyaniyameneṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ copalabhata evamaniyamenaiveṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ ca saṃpādayiṣyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7048: satyapi svātantrye kārakavaicitryādaniyatā pravṛttiriti sūtreṇa pariharati-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7051: nanvātmā viṣayasaṃbandhāya karaṇānyapekṣate cetkathaṃ svatantra ityāśaṅkyamāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7054: kiṃ tu svetarakārakaprayoktṛtve sati kārakāpreryatvaṃ svātantryaṃ tena svatantro
GSP33brssgo2u:7061: yadi purvijñānaśabdavācyā buddhireva kartrī syāttataḥ śaktiviparyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7063: satyāṃ ca buddheḥ kartṛśaktau tasyā evāhaṃpratyayaviṣayatvamabhyupagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7067: śakto 'pi hi sankartā karaṇamupādāya kriyāsu pravartamāno dṛśyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7068: tataśca saṃjñāmātre vivādaḥ syānna vastubhedaḥ kaścit /
GSP33brssgo2u:7074: sa kartā sa eva jīvo yattadapekṣitaṃ karaṇaṃ tanmana iti jīvakartṛtvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ //38//
GSP33brssgo2u:7078: yo 'pyayamaupaniṣadātmapratipattiprayojanaḥ samādhirupadiṣṭo vedānteṣu- 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyasitavya so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ' (bṛ. 2.4.5)
GSP33brssgo2u:7091: tatpunaḥ svābhāvikaṃ vā syādupādhinimittaṃ veti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7112: nahi vivekināṃ parasmādanyo jīvo nāma kartā bhoktā vā vidyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7115: para eva tarhi saṃsārī kartā bhoktā ca prasajyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:7116: parasmādanyaśceccitimāñjīvaḥ kartā buddhyādisaṃghātavyatirikto na syāt / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:7118: tathāca śāstram- 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati' (bṛ. 2.4.14)
GSP33brssgo2u:7119: ityavidyāvasthāyāṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtve darśayitvā vidyāvasthāyāṃ te eva kartṛtvabhoktṛtve nivārayati- 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛ. 2.4.14) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7120: tathā svapnajāgaritayorātmana upādhisaṃparkakṛtaṃ śramaṃ śyenasyevākāśe viparipatataḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:7121: śrāvayitvā tadabhāvaṃ suṣuptau prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvaktasya śrāvayati- 'tadvā asyaitadāptakāmamātmakāmamakāmaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:7123: ityārabhya eṣāsya paramā gatireṣāsya paramā saṃpadeṣo 'sya paramo loka eṣo 'syaparama ānandaḥ (bṛ. 4.3.32)
GSP33brssgo2u:7128: yathā tu takṣā loke vāsyādikaraṇahastaḥ kartā duḥkhī bhavati sa eva svagṛhaṃ prāpto
GSP33brssgo2u:7130: ātmā svapnajāgaritāvasthayoḥ kartā duḥkhī bhavati sa tacchramāpanuttaye svamātmānaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:7131: paraṃ brahma praviśya vimuktakāryakaraṇasaṃghāto 'kartā sukhī bhavati saṃprasādāvasthāyām /
GSP33brssgo2u:7132: tathā muktyavasthāyāmapyavidyādhvāntaṃ vidyāpradīpena vidhūyātmaiva kevalo nivṛttaḥ sukhī bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7134: takṣā hi viśiṣṭheṣu takṣaṇādivyāpāreṣvapekṣyaiva pratiniyatāni karaṇāni vāsyādīni kartā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7136: evamayamātmā sarvavyāpāreṣvapekṣyaiva manaādīni karaṇāni kartā bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:7138: natvātmanasthakṣṇa ivāvayavāḥ santi yairhastādibhiriva vāsyādīni takṣā manaādīni karaṇānyātmopādadīta nyasyedvā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7141: vidhiśāstraṃ tāvadyathāprāptaṃ kartṛtvamupādāya kartavyaviśeṣamupadiśati na kartṛtvamātmanaḥ pratipādayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7147: nanu saṃdhye sthāne prasupteṣu karaṇeṣu sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartata iti vihāra upadiśyamānaḥ kevalasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvamāvahati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7148: tathopādāne 'pi 'tadeṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya' iti karaṇeṣu karmakaraṇavibhaktī śrūyamāṇe kevalasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ gamayata iti
GSP33brssgo2u:7157: vihāro 'pi ca tatratyo vāsanāmaya eva natu pāramārthiko 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7158: tathāca śrutirivākārānubaddhameva svapnavyāpāraṃ varṇayati- 'uteva strībhiḥ saha modamāno jakṣadutevāpi bhayāni paśyan' (bṛ. 4.3.13) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7159: laukikā api tathaiva svapnaṃ kathayanti- ārukṣamiva giriśṛṅgamadrākṣamiva vanarājimiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7160: tathopādāne 'pi yadyapi karaṇeṣu karmakaraṇavibhaktinirdeśastathāpi tatsaṃpṛktasyaivātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7162: bhavati ca loke 'nekaprakārā vivakṣā yodhā yudhyante yodhai rājā yudhyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7163: apicāsminnupādāne karaṇavyāpāroparamamātraṃ vivakṣyate na svātantryaṃ kasyacidabuddhipūrvakasyāpi svāpe karaṇavyāpāroparamasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7164: yastvayaṃ vyapadeśo darśitaḥ 'vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute' iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:7174: 'sa eṣa vācaścittasyottarottarakramo yadyajñaḥ' iti ca śrutyantare yajñasya vāgbuddhisādhyatvāvadhāramāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7175: naca buddheḥ śaktiviparyayaḥ karaṇānāṃ kartṛtvābhyupagame bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7198: sāṃkhyanirāsenātmanaḥ kartṛtve sādhite bādhakābhāvāt tatsatyamiti mīmāṃsakādipakṣaḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7200: ahaṃ kartetyanubhavasahitakartṛtvaśrutibalena tasyāgamasya stāvakatvāditi prāpta utsūtrameva siddhāntayati-na svābhāvikamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7202: nanu kartṛtvaṃ nāma kriyāśaktirmuktāvapyasti tathāpi śaktikāryasya kriyārūpaśakyasyābhāvānmukteḥ puruṣārthatvasiddhiriti śaṅkate-nanu sthitāyāmiti
GSP33brssgo2u:7207: asti hi pralaye 'pi kāryaṃ punarudbhavayogyaṃ sūkṣmaṃ śakyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7208: tathāca śaktyā dharmādinimitteḥ sahitakāryākṣepānmuktilopa iti pariharati-na nimittānāmapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7209: sanimittasya kāryasya śakyatvena śaktyā saṃbandhānnamittānāmapi paramparayā śaktisaṃbandhitvamuktaṃ mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7211: yadvā śaktirlakṣaṇamākṣepakaṃ yasya kāryasya tena kāryeṇa yaḥ saṃbandhasteneti vyadhikaraṇe tṛtīye /
GSP33brssgo2u:7222: buddhyādisaṃghātādvyatirikto yadi parasmādanyaścetano na syāttadā para eva saṃsārī prasajyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:7225: na vayaṃ śuddhasya ciddhātoḥ parasya bandhaṃ vadāmaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7226: kintu tasyaivāvidyābuddhyādiprativimbitasyāvidyayā bhinnasya jīvatvaṃ prāptasya bandhamokṣāviti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7227: kalpitabhedo 'pi loke bimbapratibimbayordharmavyavasthāpako dṛṣṭa iti pariharati-nāvidyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7237: ātmā svato 'kartā buddhyādyupādhinā tu kartetyubhayathābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7240: yathā sphaṭikasya lauhityaṃ kusumādyupādhikaṃ tathātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ buddhyādyupādhikamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ siddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:7241: naca tau buddherātmakartṛtve karaṇatvaviṣayau nopādānatvaviṣayāviti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7244: nanu takṣā svahastādinā vāsyādipreraṇaśaktatvātsvataḥ kartā ātmā tu niravayavatvādaśakta
GSP33brssgo2u:7246: śāstreṇānūdyamānaṃ kartṛtvaṃ svābhāvikameva kiṃ na syādityata āha-naca svābhāvikamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7247: upādhyabhāvakāle śrutaṃ kartṛtvaṃ svābhāvikameveti śaṅkate-nanu saṃdhya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7248: kiñca karaṇairviśiṣṭasya kartṛtve teṣāṃ kartrantarbhāvātteṣvapi kartṛvibhaktiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7254: na karaṇavibhaktirityuktaṃ pratyāha-bhavati ca loka iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7260: pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ jīva ityaṅgīkṛtya jīvasya kartṛtve tanuta iti śrutiruktā,
GSP33brssgo2u:7261: saṃprati tayā śrutyānupahitātmanaḥ kartṛtvamiti prāptau vijñānaṃ buddhireva tasyā evātra kartṛtvamucyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7263: 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ'ityādiśrutiṣu vijñānabdasya buddhau prasiddhatvādatra ca manomayakośānantaraṃ paṭhitatvācchraddhādiliṅgācca buddhireva vijñānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7265: 'mahadyakṣaṃ prathamajam'ityādiśrutau hiraṇyagarbhabrahmātmakabuddherjyeṣṭhatvokteratra devairindriyairūpāsyamānaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ brahma vijñānaṃ buddhirevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7267: kiñca śrutyantare yajñasya buddhikāryatvokteratrāpi yajñakartṛvijñānaṃ buddhirityāha-sa eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7268: cittena dhyātvā vācā mantroktyā yajño jāyate tataścittasya vācaḥ pūrvottarabhāvo yajña ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7273: tarhi buddhyādīnāṃ kartṛtve karaṇatvavārtā teṣu na syādityata āha-upalabdhīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7274: yathā kāṣṭhānāṃ svavyāpāre kartṛtve 'pi pākāpekṣayā karaṇatvaṃ tathā buddhyādīnāmadhyavasāyasaṃkalpādikriyākartṛtve 'pyupalabdhyapekṣayā karaṇatvamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:7275: nanu tarhyupalabdhiḥ kasya vyāpāra ityāha-sā ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7277: yasya yo vyāpāraḥ sa tasya karteti sthiterityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7278: upalabdhernityatve buddhyādīnāṃ kathaṃ karaṇatvamuktamiti ceducyate-akhaṇḍasākṣicaitanyaṃ buddhivṛttibhirbhinnaṃ sadviṣayāvācchinnatvena jāyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:7279: tathāca viṣayāvacchinnacaitanyākhyopalabdhau buddhyādīnāṃ karaṇatvaṃ buddhyādyupahitātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ na kevalasya,
GSP33brssgo2u:7280: naca buddhereva tatkartṛtvaṃ caitanyasya jaḍavyāpāratvāyogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7281: yaccoktaṃ buddheḥ kartṛtve sa evāhandhīgamyo jīva iti tasya karaṇāntaraṃ kalpanīyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7282: tathāca nāmamātre vivāda iti tatra kevalātmanaḥ kartṛtvamuktamiti bhrāntiṃ nirasyati-ahaṅkāreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7283: sāṃkhyanirāsārthaṃ buddhyabhedenādhyastacidātmakāhaṅkāragataṃ kartṛtvaṃ yaduktaṃ tadahandhīgamyasya buddhiviśiṣṭātmana eva na kevalasya sākṣiṇo
GSP33brssgo2u:7285: evaṃ viśiṣṭātmanaḥ kartṛtve viśeṣaṇībhūtāyā jaḍabuddhereva karaṇatvopapatterna karaṇāntarakalpanāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7286: adhyāsaṃ vinā kevalabuddhikartṛtvavādinastu karaṇāntaraprasaṅgo durvāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7295: tatra prāptaṃ tāvanneśvaramapekṣate jīvaḥ kartṛtva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7298: ayaṃ hi jīvaḥ svayameva rāgadveṣādidoṣaprayuktaḥ kārakāntarasāmagrīsamapannaḥ kartṛtvamanubhavituṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7300: naca loke prasiddhirasti kṛṣyādikāsu kriyāsvanaḍudādivadīśvaro 'paro 'pekṣitavya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7301: kleṣātmakena ca kartṛtvena jantūnsaṃsṛjata īśvarasya nairghṛṇyaṃ prasajyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:7305: sāpekṣatvaṃ ceśvarasya saṃbhavati satorjantūnāṃ dharmādharmayostayośca sadbhāvaḥ sati jīvasya kartṛtve /
GSP33brssgo2u:7309: etāṃ prāptiṃ tuśabdena vyāvartya pratijānīte- 'parāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7317: yadyapi ca loke kṛṣyādiṣu karmasu neśvarakāraṇatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7319: tathāhi śrutirbhavati- 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7320: eṣa hyevāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate' (kauṣī. 3.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7323: yathā sphaṭike lauhityādhyāse lohitadravyaṃ karaṇaṃ tenāyaṃ sphaṭiko lohita ityanubhavāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:7325: tadadhyastaṃ kartṛtvamupajīvya jīvasya kārakasaṃpannatvādīśvarasya kārayitṛtvaśruteśca saṃśayamāha-yadidamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7331: pūrvaṃ jīvasya dharmādharmavattvaṃ siddhavatkṛtya tatsāpekṣatvādviṣamajagatkartṛtvamaviruddhamityuktaṃ saṃprati īśvarādhīnatve jīvasya kartṛtve siddhe dharmādharmavattvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7333: īśvarasya kārayitṛtve siddhe jīvasya kartṛtvasiddhiriti cakrakāpatteḥ karmasāpekṣatvaṃ na saṃbhavatītyucyata ityāha-satyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7336: anapekṣasya pravartakatve dharmavato narān duḥkhenādharmavataḥ sukhena yojayet,
GSP33brssgo2u:7337: kāruṇikatve vā sarve sukhena ekarūpāḥ syuruti jagadvaicitryaṃ vidhyādiśāstraṃ ca na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7338: tasmādvidhyādiśāstrārthavattvāya rāgadveṣāyattaṃ svata eva jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7340: īśvarastāvikā vā sā śrutiriti prāpte siddhāntayati-etāmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7341: yathā candanādisāmagryāṃ satyāṃ dharmavyatirike sukhavyatirekagrahābhāve 'pi 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati'ityādiśāstraprāmāṇyādeva dharmasya
GSP33brssgo2u:7345: nanvevamīśvarasya kārayitṛtve sati vaiṣamyanairghaṇye syātāmakṛtābhyāgamaśca jīvasyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7349: kṛto yaḥ prayatno jīvasya dharmādharmalakṣaṇastadapekṣa evainamīśvaraḥ kārayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7351: jīvakṛtadharmādharmavaiṣamyāpekṣa eva tattatphalāni viṣamaṃ vibhajetparjanyavadīśvaro nimittatvamātreṇa /
GSP33brssgo2u:7352: yathā loke nānāvidhānāṃ gucchagulmādīnāṃ vrīhiyavādīnāṃ cāsādhāraṇebhyaḥ svasvabījebhyo jāyamānānāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati parjanyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7355: evaṃ jīvakṛtaprayatnāpekṣa īśvarasteṣāṃ śubhāśubhaṃ vidadhyāditi śliṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7356: nanu kṛtaprayatnāpekṣatvameva jīvasya parāyatte kartṛtve nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7360: apica pūrvaprayatnamapekṣyedānīṃ kārayati pūrvataraṃ ca prayatnamapekṣya pūrvamakārayadityanāditvātsaṃsārasyetyanavadyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7370: īśvarasya cātyantānapekṣatve laukikasyāpi puruṣakārasya vaiyarthyaṃ tathā deśakālanimittānāṃ pūrvoktadoṣaprasaṅgaścetyevañjātīyakaṃ doṣajātamādigrahaṇena darśayati // 42 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7372: yadi viśeṣahetūnāṃ sādhāraṇahetvapekṣatvānna vaiyarthyaṃ tarhi īśvarasyāpi sādhāraṇahetutvānna vaiyarthyamityāha-parjanyavaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7376: kimīśvarasya kārayitṛtve jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ na syādityāpādyate uta cakrakāpattirvā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7380: anavadyaṃ jīvasya kartṛtvamīśvarasya kārayitṛtvaṃ ceti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7384: tayoḥ sthāne sa eva niyujyeta abhiṣicyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:7385: tayoḥ kāryaṃ sa eva kuryāditi yāvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:7390: tasmāt karmasāpekṣeśvarasya kārayitṛtvāt 'eṣa hyeva'ityādiśrutervidhyādiśrutyavirodha iti siddham //42//
GSP33brssgo2u:7394: aṃśo nānāvyapadeśād anyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvam adhīyata eke / BBs_2,3.43 /
GSP33brssgo2u:7396: sa ca saṃbaddhayoreva loke dṛṣṭo yathā svāmibhṛtyayoryathā vāgnivisphuliṅgayoḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7397: tataśca jīveśvarayorapyupakāryopakārakabhāvābhyupagamātkiṃ svāmibhṛtyavatsaṃbandha āhosvidagnivisphuliṅgavadityasyāṃ vicikitsāyāmaniyamo vā prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7398: athavā svāmibhṛtyaprakāreṣveveśitrīśitavyabhāvasya prasiddhatvāttadvidha eva saṃbandha iti prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7402: aṃśa ivāṃśo nahi niravayavasya mukhyoṃ'śaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7406: 'etameva viditvā munirbhavati' ' ya ātmani tiṣṭhannātmānamantaro yamayati' iti caivañjātīyako bhedanirdeśo nāsati bhede yujyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7407: nanu cāyaṃ nānāvyapadeśaḥ sutarāṃ svāmibhṛtyasārūpye yujyata ityata āha- anyathā cāpīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7409: kiṃ tarhyanyathā cāpi vyapadeśo bhavatyanānātvasya pratipādakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7410: tathāhi- eke śākhino dāśakitavādibhāvaṃ brahmaṇa āmanantyātharvaṇikā brahmasūkte- 'brahma dāśā brahma dāsā brahmaiveme kitavāḥ' ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7413: ye cānye kitavā dyūtakṛtaste sarve brahmaiveti hīnajantūdāharaṇena sarveṣāmeva nāmarūpakṛtakāryakaraṇasaṃghātapraviṣṭānāṃ jīvānāṃ brahmatvamāha
GSP33brssgo2u:7414: tathānyatrāpi brahmaprakriyāyāmevāyamarthaḥ prapañcyate- 'tvaṃ strī tvaṃ pumānasi tvaṃ kumāra uta vā kumārī /
GSP33brssgo2u:7415: tvaṃ jīrṇo daṇḍena vañcasi tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ' (śve. 4.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7416: 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:7422: nityaḥ svaprakāśo 'naṇurakartā jīva'iti śodhitatvaṃpadārthasyātra brahmaikyasādhanena bhedābhedaśrutīnāṃ virodhasamādhānātpādasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7426: prasiddhasvasvāmitvasaṃbandhasaṃbhavādyaḥ kaścit saṃbandha ityaniyamo na yukta ityarucerāha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7430: lokasiddhānarthātmakabhedānuvāditvena bhedaśrutīnāṃ durbalatvādajñātaphalavadabhedaśrutyanusāreṇa prakalpitabhedanibandhanoṃ'śāṃśibhāvaḥ saṃbandha iti siddhāntayati-ata ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7431: agneḥ sāṃśatve 'pi niṣkaleśvarasya kathaṃ sāṃśatvamata āha-aṃśa iveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7433: bheda eva cetsvasvāmibhāvo yukto nāṃśāṃśibhāva iti śaṅkate-nanu ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7435: vañcasi gacchasi yadāste yo nāmarūpe nirmāya praviśya vyavaharanvartate taṃ vidvānamṛto bhavatīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7448: asya sahasraśīrṣapuruṣasya tāvānprapañco mahimā vibhūtiḥ puruṣastasmātprapañcāt jyāyānmahattaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7452: atra bhūtaśabdasya prāṇiṣu prayogātsūtroktamantre 'pi tatheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7459: īśvaragītāsvapi ceśvaraṃśatvaṃ jīvasya smaryate- 'mamaivāṃśo jīvaloke jīvabhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ' (15.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7464: atrāha- nanu jīvasyeśvarāṃśatvābhyupagame tadīyena saṃsāraduḥkhopabhogenāṃśina īśvarasyāpi duḥkhitvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7465: yathā loke hastapādādyanyatamāṅgagatena duḥkhenāṅgino devadattasya duḥkhitvaṃ tadvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:7467: ato varaṃ pūrvāvasthaḥ saṃsāra evāstviti samyagdarśanānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7471: aupādhike īśvarasya niyantṛtve jīva eva tanniyantā kiṃ na syādityata āha-niratiśayeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7482: yathā jīvaḥ saṃsāraduḥkhamanubhavati naivaṃ para īśvaro 'nubhavatīti pratijānīmahe /
GSP33brssgo2u:7483: jīvo hyavidyāveśavaśāddehādyātmabhāvamiva gatvā tatkṛtena duḥkhena duḥkhyahamityavidyayā kṛtaṃ duḥkhopabhogamabhimanyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7489: tataśca niścitametadavagamyate- mithyābhimānabhramanimitta eva duḥkhānubhava iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7491: tathāhi- putramitrādimatsu bahuṣūpaviṣṭeṣu tatsaṃbandhābhimāniṣvitareṣu ca putro
GSP33brssgo2u:7499: pratipadyamāneṣu tattadbhāvamiva pratipadyamāno 'pi na paramārthatastadbhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7500: yathā cākāśo ghaṭādiṣu gacchatsu gacchanniva vibhāvyamāno 'pi na paramārthato gacchati,
GSP33brssgo2u:7501: yathā codaśarāvādikampanāttadgate sūryapratibimbe kampamāne 'pi na tadvānsūryaḥ kampate,
GSP33brssgo2u:7502: evamavidyāpratyupasthāpite buddhyādyupahite jīvākhyeṃ'śe duḥkhāyamāne 'pi na tadvānīśvaro duḥkhāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7504: tathācāvidyānimittajīvabhāvavyudāsena brahmabhāvameva jīvasya pratipādayanti vedāntāḥ 'tattvamasi' ityevamādayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7513: naivaṃpara iti pratijñānaṃ vibhajate-yathā jīva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7518: bhrāntau satyāṃ duḥkhamityanvayamuktvā bhrāntyabhāve duḥkhābhāvadarśanācca bhrāntikṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti niścīyata ityāha-vyatireketi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7520: jīvasyāpi samyagjñāne duḥkhābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ kimu vācyaṃ nityasarvajñeśvarasyetyāha-ataśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7521: evamaṃśitve hetoḥ sopādhikatvamuktvā yoṃ'śī sa vastutaḥ svāṃśadharmavānitī vyāptiṃ sthalatraye vyabhicārayati-prakāśādivaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7524: kiñca jīvasyeśvarasya vā vastuto duḥkhitvānumānaṃ na yuktamāgamabādhādityāha-tathāceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7529: smaranti ca vyāsādayo yathā jaivena duḥkhena na paramātmā duḥkhāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7530: 'tatra yaḥ paramātmā hi sa nityo nirguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7532: karmātmā tvaparo yo 'sau mokṣabandhanaiḥ sa yujyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7533: sa saptadaśakenāpi rāśinā yujyate punaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7536: 'ekastathā sarvabhūtāntarātmā na lipyate lokaduḥkhena bāhyaḥ' (kaṭha. 5.11) iti ca // 47 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7537: atrāha- yadi tarhyeka eva sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmantarātmā syātkathamanujñāparihārau syātāṃ lokikau vaidikau ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7541: anaṃśitvamapi hi jīvasyābhedavādinyaḥ śrutayaḥ pratipādayanti- 'tatsṛṣṭvā tadevānuprāviśat' (te. 2.6.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:7543: , 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19)
GSP33brssgo2u:7549: abheda eva tvatra pratipipādayiṣito brahmātmatvapratipattau puruṣārthasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7551: naca niravayavasya brahmaṇo mukhyoṃ'śo jīvaḥ saṃbhavatītyuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7552: tasmātparaḥ evaikaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmantarātmā jīvabhāvenāvasthita ityato vaktavyānujñāparihāropapattiḥ // 47 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:7555: saptadaśakena daśendrayāṇi pañca prāṇaḥ mano buddiśceti saptadaśasaṃkhyāko rāśirliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7556: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyu - iha brahmaṇi yo nāneva kalpitabhedaśāli cetanācetanātmakaṃ viśvaṃ paśyati sa mṛtyoranantaraṃ mṛtyuṃ janmamaraṇādiparamparārūpaṃ saṃsāraṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7560: daśendriyāṇi pañca prāṇāḥ mano buddhiśceti saptadaśasaṃkhyāko rāśirliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7564: yato bāhyo 'saṅgastasmānna lipyate evamaṃśitvakṛtamīśvare doṣaṃ nirasyāṃśa ityuktaṃ jīvasyāṃśatvaṃ dehādyupādhikamiti sphuṭayitumatyantasvarūpaikyamādāyākṣipati-atrāhetyādinā
GSP33brssgo2u:7567: niravayavabrahmaṇo mukhyāṃśo na saṃbhavatīti vadatā siddhāntinā bhedo nāstītyuktaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:7586: dṛṣṭā ca sā sarvaprāṇināmahaṃ gacchāmyahamāgacchāmyahamandho 'hamanandho 'haṃ mūḍho 'hamamūḍha ityevamātmikā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7597: satyaṃ vyatirekadarśino niyojyatvaṃ tathāpi vyomādivaddehādyasaṃhatatvamapaśyata evātmano niyojyatvābhimānaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7605: yathāca prakāśa ekasyāpi savituramedhyadeśasaṃbaddhaḥ parihriyate netaraḥ śucibhūmiṣṭhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7608: yathā mūtraparīṣaṃ gavāṃ pavitratayā parigṛhyate tadeva jātyantare parivarjyate tadvat // 48 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:7612: nanu bhrānteḥ kutaścinnivṛttau vyavahāravicchedaḥ syādityata āha-na hyasyā ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7628: ajñasyāpi bhrāntyabhāvakāle niyojyatvaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ kimu vācyamātmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7630: viṣayavairāgyasya jñānārthamabhyastasya jñānānantaramanuvṛttyā viṣayeṣu pravartakarāganivṛtternātiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7640: yatsvayaṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ sa caikātmyābhyupagame vyatikīryeta svāmyekatvāditi cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:7643: nahi kartṛbhoktṛścātmanaḥ saṃtataḥ sarvaiḥ śarīraiḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7646: tataśca karmavyatikaraḥ phalavyatikaro vā na bhaviṣyati // 49 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7651: tasmātsvargī narakī ceti vyavasthāsiddhaye ātmasvarūpabhedo vācya iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7652: bhavettadā sāṃkaryaṃ yadyanupahitātmana eva bhoktṛtvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7656: tathāca buddheḥ paradehāsaṃbandhāttadupahitajīvasya nāsti paradehasaṃbandha iti buddhibhedena bhoktṛbhedānna karmādisāṃkaryamiti samādhānārthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:7660: ābhāsa eva caiṣa jīvaḥ parasyātmano jalasūryakādivatpratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7663: ataśca yathā naikasmiñjalasūryake kampamāne jalasūryakāntaraṃ kampate,
GSP33brssgo2u:7668: yeṣāṃ tu bahava ātmānaste ca sarve sarvagatāsteṣāmevaiṣa vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7670: bahavo vibhavaścātmānaścaitanyamātrasvarūpā nirguṇā niratiśayāśca tadarthaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ pradhānaṃ tannimittaiṣāṃ bhogāpavargasiddhiriti sāṃkhyāḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:7671: sati bahutve vibhutve ca ghaṭakuḍyādisamānā dravyamātrasvarūpāḥ svato 'cetanā ātmanastadupakaraṇāni cāṇūni manāṃsyacetanāni /
GSP33brssgo2u:7672: tatrātmadravyāṇāṃ manodravyāṇāṃ ca saṃyogānnavecchādayo vaiśeṣikā ātmaguṇā utpadyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:7673: te cāvyatirekeṇa pratyekamātmasu samavayanti sa saṃsāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7675: tatra sāṃkhyānāṃ tāvaccaitanyasvarūpatvātsarvātmanāṃ saṃnidhānādyaviśeṣāccaikasya sukhaduḥkhasaṃbandhe sarveṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃbandhaḥ prāpnoti
GSP33brssgo2u:7683: asatyāṃ punarupapattau kāmaṃ mā bhūdabhilaṣitaṃ puruṣakaivalyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7685: kāṇādānāmapi yadaikenātmanā manaḥ saṃyujyate tadātmāntarairapi nāntarīyakaḥ saṃyogaḥ syātsaṃnidhānādyaviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7686: tataśca hetvaviśeṣātphalāviśeṣa ityekasyātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoge sarvātmanāmapi samānaṃ sukhaduḥkhitvaṃ prasajyeta // 50 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7688: saṃprati evakāreṇāvacchedapakṣāruciṃ sūcayan 'rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva'ityādiśrutisiddhaṃpratibimbapakṣamupanyasyati bhagavān sūtrakāraḥ-ābhāsa eva ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7694: asmin pakṣe buddhipratibimbabhedātsvargī nārakītyādivyavasthā jīvatvasyāvidyakatvādvidyayā mokṣaścetyupapadyata ityāha-ataścetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7695: yastvayaṃ bhāskarasya pralāpaḥ pratibimbasya nopādhisaṃsṛṣṭatayā kalpitatvaṃ kintu svarūpeṇaiva,
GSP33brssgo2u:7696: ataḥ kalpitapratibimbasya muktau sthityayogānna jīvatvamiti sa siddhāntarahasyājñānakṛta ityupekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7697: yadi darpaṇe mukhaṃ śuktau rajatavatkalpitaṃ syāttadā nedaṃ rajatamiti svarūpabādhavannedaṃ mukhamiti bādhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7707: sarveṣāṃ puṃsāṃ prakṛtisāṃnidhyādyaviśeṣe 'pi prakṛtireva pratipuruṣaṃ niyamena bhogāpavargārthaṃ pravartate,
GSP33brssgo2u:7709: anyathā niyatapravṛttyanaṅgīkāre svamāhātmyakhyāpanārthā pradhānasya pravṛttirityuddeśyavighātaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7712: yo hi niyāmakabhāvenoddeśyavighātamāpādayati taṃ prati tasyaivāpādanamiṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7716: yadātmādṛṣṭakṛto yo manaḥsaṃyogaḥ sa tadātmana eva sukhādiheturiti vyavasthāṃ śaṅkate-syādetaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7725: sāṃkhyānāṃ tāvattadanātmasamavāyi pradhānavarti pradhānasādhāraṇyānna pratyātmaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogasya niyāmakamupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7726: kāṇādānāmapi pūrvavatsādhāraṇenātmamanaḥsaṃyogena nirvartitasyādṛṣṭasyāpyasyaivātmana idamadṛṣṭamiti niyame hetvabhāvādeṣa eva doṣaḥ // 51 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7728: ahamidaṃ phalaṃ prāpnavānīdaṃ pariharāṇītthaṃ prayatā itthaṃ karavāṇītyevaṃvidhā abhisaṃdhyādayaḥ pratyātmaṃ pravartamānā adṛṣṭasyātmanāṃ ca svasvāmibhāvaṃ niyaṃsyantīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7735: abhisaṃdhyādīnāmapi sādhāraṇenaivātmamanaḥsaṃyogena sarvātmasaṃnidhau kriyamāṇānāṃ niyamahetutvānupapatteruktadoṣānuṣaṅga eva // 52 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7741: athocyeta vibhutve 'pyatmanaḥ śarīrapratiṣṭhena manasā saṃyogaḥ śarīrāvacchinna evātmapradeśe
GSP33brssgo2u:7742: bhaviṣyatīti ataḥ pradeśakṛtā vyavasthābhisaṃdhyādīnāmadṛṣṭasya sukhaduḥkhayośca bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7747: tatra na vaiśeṣikaiḥ śarīrāvacchinno 'pyātmānaḥ pradeśaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7748: kalpyamāno 'pyayaṃ niṣpradeśasyātmanaḥ pradeśaḥ kālpanikatvādeva na pāramārthikaṃ kāryaṃ niyantuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7749: śarīramapi sarvātmasaṃnidhāvutpadyamānamasyaivātmano netareṣāmiti na niyantuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7750: pradeśaviśeṣābhyupagame 'pi ca dvayorātmanoḥ samānasukhaduḥkhabhājoḥ kadācidekenaiva tāvaccharīreṇopabhogasiddhiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7753: yajñadattaśarīre ca taṃ pradeśamanuprāpte tasyāpītareṇa samānaḥ sukhaduḥkhānubhavo
GSP33brssgo2u:7754: dṛśyate sa na syādyadi devadattayajñadattayoḥ samānapradeśamaniṣṭaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7774: kāryamabhisaṃdhyādikaṃ yasyātmano yaccharīraṃ tatra tasyaiva bhoga iti vyavasthāmāśaṅkyāha-śarīramapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7776: yasminnātmapradeśe 'dṛṣṭotpattiḥ sa kiṃ calaḥ sthito vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7778: dvitīye tasminneva pradeśe parasyāpi bhogadarśanādadṛṣṭamastītyekenāpi śarīreṇa dvayorātmanorbhogaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7780: kiñca yattu yatrātmanaḥ pradeśe śarīrādisaṃyogādadṛṣṭamutpannaṃ tattatraivācalapradeśe
GSP33brssgo2u:7781: sthitamiti svargādiśarīrāvacchinnātmanyadṛṣṭābhāvādbhogo na syādataḥ pradeśabhedo na vyavasthāpakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7785: yadapi kecidāhuḥ-manasa ekatve 'pyātmanāṃ bhedena saṃyogavyaktīnāṃ bhedātkayācitsaṃyogavyaktyā kasmiṃścedevātmanyadṛṣṭādikamityasāṃkaryamiti
GSP33brssgo2u:7798: tathāca devadattātmā yajñadattātmano na bhinnaḥ ātmatvāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:7801: nityadravyamātravṛttayo viśeṣāste ca svayaṃ svāśrayavyāvartakā eva na sveṣāṃ vyāvartakamapekṣanta ityantyā ucyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:7809: yattu bahūnāṃ vibhutve ākāśadikkālā dṛṣṭānta iti so 'pyasaṃmata ityāha-ākāśādīnāmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7814: evaṃ bhūtabhoktṛśrutīnāṃ virodhābhāvādbrahmaṇyadvaye samanvaya iti siddham //53//
GSP33brssgo2u:7816: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śrīśārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
GSP33brssgo2u:7817: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brssgo2u:7829: iti caivamādiṣūtpattiprakaraṇeṣu prāṇānāmutpajirnāmnāyate kvaciccānutpattirevaiṣāmāmnāyate 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' (tai. 2.7)
GSP33brssgo2u:7832: prāṇā vāva ṛṣayaḥ' ityatra prāgutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvaśravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7833: anyatra tu prāṇānāmapyutpattiḥ paṭhyate- 'yathāgnerjvalataḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccarantyevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ' iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:7836: iti, 'sa prāṇamasṛjata prāṇācchraddhāṃ khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivīndriyaṃ mano 'nnam' (pra. 6.4)
GSP33brssgo2u:7853: atra prāṇotpattivādivākyajātamujadāharaṇam- 'etasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti' (bṛ. 2.1.20)
GSP33brssgo2u:7855: tatra yathā lokādayaḥ parasmādbrahmaṇa utpadyante tathā prāṇā apītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7856: tathā- 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:7860: yathātītānantarapādādyuktā viyadādayaḥ parasya brahmaṇo vikārāḥ samadhigatāstathā prāṇā api parasya brahmaṇo vikārā iti yojayitavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7863: nanu keṣucitpradeśeṣu na prāṇānāmutpattiḥ śrūyata ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7869: yathā tṛtīyādhyaye caturthapādeṣvapratigraheṣvadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyo bahusūtravyavahito 'pi somavamane parāmṛśyate tadvadatrāpi jñeyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7870: pūrvādhikaraṇe kartuḥ svarūpaṃ vicārya tadupakaraṇānāmindriyāṇāmutpatti sādhayati-tathā prāṇāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7871: bhūtabhoktṛvicārānantaraṃ bhautikaprāṇavicāra iti hetuhetumadbhāvaṃ pādayoḥ saṃgatimāha-viyadādīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7876: te kimutpadyante na veti śrutīnāṃ vipratipattyā saṃśaye tāsāṃ samabalatvādanirṇaya ityaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7885: yadyapyadṛṣṭavatprāṇā apyaniyatā iti sūtramanveti tathāpi punaruktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7895: kimiyaṃ vāruṇīṣṭirdāturuta pratigrahīturiti viśaye 'pratigṛhṇīyāt'iti śruteḥ pratigrahīturityāśaṅkya
GSP33brssgo2u:7897: ataḥ pratigṛhṇīyādityasya padasyāśvān yaḥ pratigrāhayedityarthaḥ dadyāditi yāvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:7898: 'yo 'śvadātā sa vāruṇīmiṣṭiṃ kuryāt'iti vākyārthe sthite cintā-aśvadānanimitteyamiṣṭiḥ kiṃ laukike 'śvadāne vaidike veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7901: syāditi sūtreṇa prāpte siddhāntaḥ-'atra hi varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti yo 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇāti'iti
GSP33brssgo2u:7904: naca laukike 'śvadāne 'yaṃ rogo bhavati iti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:7907: naca vṛṇotīti vyutpattyā varuṇaśabdo niṣedhātikramakṛtadoṣānuvādaka iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7909: tattyāge ca vaidike 'pi dāne 'śvatyāgajanyaduḥkhaṃ prāptamuktavyutpattyā śaknotyanuvadituṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7911: somapāne kriyamāṇe vyāpadvamanaṃ yadi syāttadā 'etaṃ saumendraṃ śyāmākaṃ caruṃ nirvapet'iti śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7913: tadvallaukike dhātusāmyārthaṃ pītasomasya vamane 'yaṃ caruḥ syādvamananimittendriyaśoṣākhyadoṣasya
GSP33brssgo2u:7914: dṛṣṭasya 'indriyeṇa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yaḥ somaṃ vamati'ityanuvādāditi pūrvapakṣasūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7915: vaidike tu somapāne śeṣapratipatterjātatvādvamane 'pina doṣa iti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7917: vede tu 'mā me vāṅnābhimatigāḥ'iti sāmyagjaraṇārthamantraliṅgādvamane karmavaiguṇyāttasya doṣatā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7928: iti hyekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya tatsādhanāyedamāmnāyate- 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7929: sā ca pratijñā prāṇādeḥ samastasya jāgato brahmavikāratve sati prakṛtivyatirekeṇa vikārābhāvātsiddhyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7931: tathāca pratijñātārthamupasaṃharati- 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma tapo brahma parāmṛtam' (muṇḍa. 2.2.11)
GSP33brssgo2u:7933: tathā 'ātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇena matyā vijñānenedaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' ityevañjātīyakāsu śrutiṣveṣaiva pratijñā yojayitavyā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7938: avāntaraprakṛtiviṣayaṃ tvetatsvavavikārāpekṣaṃ pragutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvāvadhāraṇamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7940: viyadadhikaraṇe hi 'gauṇyasaṃbhavāt' iti pūrvapakṣasūtratvādgauṇī janmaśrutirasaṃbhavāditi vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7943: tadanurodena tvihāpi gauṇī janmaśrutisaṃbhavāditi vyācakṣāṇaiḥ pratijñāhānirupekṣitā syāt // 2 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7944: nanu pratijñāpi gauṇī kaṃ na syādityata āha-tathāca pratijñātārthamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7949: nedaṃ vākyaṃ mahāpralaye paramakāraṇasya brahmaṇaḥ prāṇavattvaparaṃ kintvavāntarapralaye hiraṇyagarbhākhyāvāntaraprakṛtirūpaprāṇasadbhāvaparamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:7950: nanu hiraṇyagarbharūpavikārasya sattve kathaṃ tadā vikārāsattvakathanaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7953: nanu yathāśruti mahāpralaye prāṇasadbhāvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ prāṇānutpattisādhakaṃ kimityavāntarapralayaparatayā
GSP33brssgo2u:7954: nīyata iti cet 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ'ityādi prabalajanmaśrutibalāditi vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7955: nanu vikārasya brahmaṇaḥ kathaṃ prakṛtitvamityata āha-vyākṛteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7956: 'hiraṇyagarbheḥ samavartatāgre'ityādiśrutau 'ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ'ityādi smṛtau ca vikārātmanāmapi mūlakāraṇāvasthārūpāṇāṃ brahmavirāḍādīnāṃ prakṛtivikārabhāvena prasiddhirasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7964: yajjāyata ityekaṃ janmavācipadaṃ prāṇeṣu prākśrutaṃ saduttareṣvapyākāśādiṣvanuvartate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7966: ityatrākāśādiṣu mukhyaṃ janmeti pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ tatsāmānyātprāṇeṣvapi mukhyameva janma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7967: nahyekasminprakaraṇa ekasmiṃśca vākya ekaḥ śabdaḥ sakṛduccarito bahubhiḥ saṃbadhyamānaḥ kvacinmukhyaḥ kvacidgauṇa ityadhyavasātuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7970: ityatrāpi prāṇeṣu śrutaḥ sṛjatiḥ pareṣvapyutpattimatsu śraddhādiṣvanuṣajyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7971: yatrāpi paścacchruta utpattivacanaḥ śabdaḥ pūrvaiḥ saṃbadhyate tatrāpyeṣa eva nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7972: yathā 'sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti' ityayamante paṭhito vyuccarantiśabdaḥ pūrvairapi prāṇādibhiḥ saṃbadhyate // 3 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7973: tasya jāyata iti padasyākāśādiṣu mukhyasya pāṭhāpekṣayā prācīneṣu prāṇeṣu śrutermukhyaṃ janmeti sūtrayojanā-tatsāmānyāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7975: ekasminvākye ekasya śabdasya kvacinmukhyatvaṃ kvacidgauṇatvamiti vairūpyaṃ na yuktamiti nyāyamanyatrāpyatidiśati-yatrāpi paścācchruta iti //3//
GSP33brssgo2u:7982: tathāpi brahmaprakṛtikatejobannapīrvakatvābhidhānādvākprāṇamanasāṃ tatsāmānyācca sarveṣāmeva prāṇānāṃ brahmaprabhavatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7983: tathāhi- asminneva prakaraṇe tejobannapūrvakatvaṃ vākprāṇamanasāmāmnāyate- 'annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāk' (chā. 6.5.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7984: tatra yadi tāvanmukhyamevaiṣāmannādimayatvaṃ tato vartata eva brahmaprabhavatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7985: atha bhāktaṃ tatāpi brahmakartṛkāyāṃ nāmarūpavyākriyāyāṃ śravaṇāt 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' (chā. 6.1.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:7994: atra mayaḍvikāre mukhya iti pakṣe vartata eva prāṇānāṃ brahmakāryatvaṃ tejobannānāṃ brahmavikāratvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7996: vikāratve bhūtādhīnasthitikatvaṃ liṅgaṃ mayaṭoktamiti siddhaṃ brahmakāryatvaṃ 'sa
GSP33brssgo2u:7998: tasmātprāṇānāmutpattiśrutīnāṃ sadbhāvaśrutyavirodhātkāraṇe brahmaṇi samanvaya iti siddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:8007: saṃprati tu katītare prāṇā iti saṃpradhārayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8009: kvacitsapta prāṇāḥ saṃkīrtyante- 'sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmāt' (muṇḍa. 2.1.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8010: kvaciccāṣṭau prāṇā grahatvena guṇena saṃkīrtyante- ' aṣṭau grahā aṣṭāvatigrahāḥ'' (bṛ. 3.2.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8011: kvacinnava- 'sapta vai śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇā dvāvavāñcau' (tai. saṃ. 5.1.7.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8012: kvaciddaśa- 'nava vai puruṣe prāṇā nābhirdaśamī' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8016: evaṃ hi vipratipannāḥ prāṇeyattāṃ prati śrutayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8027: puruṣabhedābhiprāyeyaṃ vīpsā pratipuruṣaṃ sapta sapta prāṇā iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:8028: na tattvabhedābhiprāyā sapta saptānye 'nye prāṇā iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8029: nanvaṣṭatvādikāpi saṃkhāyā prāṇeṣūdāhṛtā kathaṃ saptaiva syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8040: evaṃ janmalabdhasattākānāṃ prāṇānāmupajīvyopajīvakatvasaṃgatyā sāṃkhyāṃ nirṇetuṃ śrutīnāṃ virodhātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣayati-saptagaterviśeṣitatvācca
GSP33brssgo2u:8043: pañca dhīndriyāṇi vāṅmanaśceti sapta prāṇā eta eva hastena sahāṣṭau /
GSP33brssgo2u:8045: gṛhṇanti badhnantīti grahā indriyāṇi teṣāṃ bandhakatvaṃ viṣayādhīnamityatigrahāḥ grahānatikrāntā viṣayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8046: dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣi dve ghrāṇe vākceti sapta śīrṣṇi bhavāḥ prāṇā dvāvavāñcau pāyūpasthau ceti nava,
GSP33brssgo2u:8047: jñānakarmendriyāṇi daśeme puruṣe dehe prāṇāḥ ātmā mana ekādaśa prāṇā iti siddhāntakoṭiruktā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8050: śrutitaḥ saptatvāvagaterye śīrṣaṇyāḥ sapta te prāṇā iti śīrṣaṇyoddeśena prāṇatvaviśeṣaṇādvā śīrṣaṇyānāṃ prāṇatvaśabditā,
GSP33brssgo2u:8061: hastādayastvapare saptabhyo 'tiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ śrūyante- 'hastau vai grahaḥ sa karmaṇātigraheṇa gṛhīto hastābhyāṃ hi karma karoti' (bṛ. 3.2.8)
GSP33brssgo2u:8064: hīnādhikasaṃkhyāvipratipattau hyadhikā saṃkhyā saṃgrāhyā bhavati tasyāṃ hīnāntarbhavati natu hīnāyāmadhikā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8065: ataśca naivaṃ mantavyaṃ stokakalpanānurodhātsaptaiva prāṇāḥ syuriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8067: tathā codāhṛtā śrutiḥ - 'daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaḥ' (bṛ. 3.9.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8072: nanvekādaśābhyaḥ kāryajātebhyo 'dhikaṃ kāryajātamasti yadarthamadhikaṃ karaṇaṃ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:8074: vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandāḥ pañca karmabhedāstadarthāni ca pañca karmendriyāṇi /
GSP33brssgo2u:8076: tadeva vṛttibhedāt kvacidbhinnavadvyapadiśyate- 'mano buddhiraṅaṃkāraścittaṃ ca' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8077: tathāca śrutiḥ kāmādyā nānāvidhā vṛttiranukramyāha- 'etatsarvaṃ mana eva' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8078: apica saptaiva śīrṣaṇyānprāṇānabhimanyamānasya catvāra eva prāṇā abhimatāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8079: sthānabhedāddhyete catvāraḥ santaḥ sapta gaṇyante 'dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve nāsike ekā vāk' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8080: naca tāvatāmeva vṛttibhedā itare prāṇā iti śakyate vaktuṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8083: ityatrāpi dehacchidrabhedābhiprāyeṇaiva daśa prāṇā ucyante na prāṇatattvabhedābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33brssgo2u:8086: mukhyasya tu prāṇasya bhavati nābhirapyekaṃ viśeṣāyatanamityato nābhirdaśamītyucyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8088: tadevaṃ vicitre prāṇeyattāmnāne sati kva kiṃparamāmnānamiti vivektavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8091: saptaiva prāṇāḥ syuryataḥ saptānāmeva gatiḥ śrūyate- 'tamutkrāmantaṃ prāṇo 'nūtkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā anūtkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.2) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo2u:8095: saptaiva hi prāṇāścakṣurādayastvakparyantā viśeṣitā iha prakṛtāḥ 'sa yatraiva cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣaḥ parāṅparyāvartate 'thārūpajño bhavati' (bṛ. 4.4.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:8098: prakṛtagāmī ca sarvaśabdo bhavati yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā iti ye nimantritāḥ prakṛtā brāhmaṇāsta eva sarvaśabdenocyante nānye /
GSP33brssgo2u:8099: evamihāpi ye prakṛtāḥ sapta prāṇāsta eva sarvaśabdenocyante nānya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8105: evaṃprāpte brūmaḥ - hastādayastvapare saptabhyo 'tiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ pratīyante-' hastau vai grahaḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.8)
GSP33brssgo2u:8109: sa ca kṣetrajño naikasminneva śarīre badhyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:8112: tathāca smṛtiḥ - puryaṣṭakena liṅgena prāṇādyena sa yujyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8113: tena baddhasya vai bandho mokṣo muktasya tena ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:8115: ātharvaṇe ca viṣayendriyānukramaṇe cakṣuṣa draṣṭavyaṃ ca ityatra tulyavaddhastādīnīndriyāṇi
GSP33brssgo2u:8116: saviṣayāṇyanukrāmati-' hastau cādātavyaṃ copasthaścānandayitavyaṃ ca pāyuśca visarjayitavyaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:8117: ca pādau ca gantavyaṃ ca' ( pra. 4.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8118: tathā 'daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaste yadāsmāccharīrānmartyādutkrāmantyatha rodayanti' (bṛ. 3.9.4)
GSP33brssgo2u:8121: sarvaśabdo 'pi ca prāṇaśabdena saṃbadhyamāno 'śeṣānprāṇānabhidadhāno na prakaraṇavaśena saptasvevāvasthāpayituṃ śakyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:8123: sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatrāpi sarveṣāmevāvanivartināṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8130: FN: guhāyāṃ hṛdaye śerata iti guhāśayāḥ svastāneṣu nihitāḥ nikṣiptāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8135: prāṇādipañcakaṃ bhūtasūkṣmapañcakaṃ jñānendriyapañcakaṃ karmendriyapañcakaṃ antaḥkaraṇacatuṣṭayaṃ avidyā kāmaḥ karma ceti paryuṣṭakam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8139: tato varaṃ prāthamikasaptatve 'ntarbhāvaḥ lāghavāditi prāpte siddhāntayati-atreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8142: ato 'dhikasaṃkhyāyā nyūnāyāmantarbhāvāyogātsaptaiva prāṇāḥ syurlāghavānurodhādityevaṃ na mantavyamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8144: 'śrutīnāṃ mitho virodhe sati mānāntarānugṛhītā śrutirbalīyasī'iti nyāyena kāryaliṅgānumānānugṛhītaikādaśaprāṇaśrutyanusāreṇānyāḥ śrutayo neyā ityabhisaṃdhāyāha-satyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8151: teṣāṃ tadvṛttitve badhirādīnāmādānādi na syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8152: kathaṃ tarhi chidre prāṇaśabda ityāśaṅkya lakṣaṇayetyāha-mukhyasya tviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8156: nanvidaṃ sūtravyākhyānamasaṃgataṃ pañcadhīndriyāvāṅmanasāṃ saptatvāvagatiḥ śīrṣaṇyānāṃ caturṇāṃ viśeṣitatvamiti hetorvaiyadhikaraṇyāduktaparisaṃkhyādoṣāccetyarucerāha-iyamapareti
GSP33brssgo2u:8158: taṃ jīvātmānaṃ ye prāṇāḥ saha gacchanti teṣāmeva bhogahetutvādindriyatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8159: vipannāvasthāyāmeva cākṣupaścakṣuṣi sthito 'nugrāhakasūryāṃśarūpaḥ puruṣaḥ parāṅ paryāvartate bahirdeśātsvāṃśinaṃ surye pratigacchati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8161: devāṃśe devaṃ praviṣṭe liṅgāṃśaścakṣurhṛdaye manasaikībhavati tadāyaṃ na paśyatīti pārśvasthā āhurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8162: ādipadāt 'na jighrati na vadati na ramayate na śṛṇoti na manute na spṛśati na vijānāti'iti gṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8167: kāmaḥ karma ceti puryaṣṭakamātmano jñāpakatvālliṅgaṃ sati saṃbhave sarvaśrutisaṃkoco
GSP33brssgo2u:8178: sūkṣmā ete prāṇāḥ sthūlāścetsyurmaraṇakāle śarīrānnirgacchanto bilādahirivopalabhyeranmriyamāṇasya pārśvasthaiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8183: yadeva hyupalabdhisādhanaṃ vṛttiranyadvā tasyaiva naḥ karaṇatvaṃ saṃjñāmātre vivāda iti karaṇānāṃ vyāpitvakalpanā nirarthikā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8188: 'prāṇāḥ sarve 'nantāḥ'iti śruterindriyāṇāṃ vibhutvātteṣāmutkrāntirasiddhā kintu tattaddehe teṣāmabhivyaktirūpāḥ prādeśikyo vṛttayaḥ santi na tāsāmutkrāntyādiriti sāṃkhyānāmākṣepaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8189: tatsaṃgatyā prāṇāḥ kiṃparimāṇā iti saṃdehe siddhāntayati-adhunetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8208: nāsadāsīye hi brahmapradhāne sūkte mantravarṇo bhavati 'na mṛtyurāsīdamṛtaṃ na tarhi na rātryā ahnu āsītpraketaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8209: ānīdavātaṃ svadhayā tadekaṃ tasmāddhānyanna paraḥ kiñcanāsa' (ṛ.saṃ. 8.7.17) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8215: 'aprāṇo hyamanāḥ śubhraḥ' iti ca mulaprakṛteḥ prāṇādisamastaviśeṣarahitatvasya darśitatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8217: śreṣṭha iti ca mukhyaṃ prāṇamabhidadhāti- 'prāṇo vāva jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca' (chā. 5.1.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:8220: na cetasya tadānīṃ vṛttilābhaḥ syādyonau niṣiktaṃ śukraṃ pūyeta na saṃbhavedvā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8224: FN: tarhi tadā pralayakāle mṛtyurmārako mṛtyumatkāryaṃ vā nāsīt,
GSP33brssgo2u:8226: rātryāḥ praketaścihnarūpaścandraḥ ahaḥ praketaḥ sūryaśca nāstāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8232: nanu prāṇo jāyate na veti saṃśayābhāvādatideśo na yukta ityākṣipati-kimartha iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8235: tarhi tadā pralayakāle mṛtyurmārako mṛtyumatkāryaṃ vā nāsīt,
GSP33brssgo2u:8237: rātryāḥ praketaścihnarūpaścandraḥ ahnaḥ praketaḥ sūryaśca nāstāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8240: yadvā svena dhṛtā māyā svadhā tayā saha tadekaṃ brahmānīdāsīditi paramārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8242: tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ paraḥ paramutkṛṣṭamanyacca kimapi na babhūvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8243: parihāraḥ subodhaḥ nanu śreṣṭhaśabdasya prāṇe prasiddhyabhāvātkathaṃ sūtramiti,
GSP33brssgo2u:8254: sa punarmukhyaḥ prāṇaḥ kiṃsvarūpa itīdānīṃ jijñāsyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8256: evaṃ hi śrūyate- 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ sa eṣa vāyuḥ pañcavidhaḥ prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samānaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8258: evaṃ hi tantrāntarīyā ācakṣate- 'sāmānyā karaṇavṛttiḥ prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañce' ti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8259: atrocyate- na vāyuḥ prāṇo nāpi karaṇavyāpāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8261: vāyostāvatprāṇasya pṛthagupadeśo bhavati- 'prāṇa eva brahmaṇaścaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca' (chāndo. 3.18.4) iti
GSP33brssgo2u:8266: nahi karaṇavyāpāra eva san karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthagupadiśyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:8269: ityevamādayo 'pi vāyoḥ karaṇebhyaśca prāṇasya pṛthagupadeśā anusartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8273: yathaitapañjaravartina ekādaśapakṣiṇaḥ pratyekaṃ pratiniyatavyāpārāḥ santaḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ pañjaraṃ cālayanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:8274: evamekaśarīravartina ekādaśa prāṇāḥ pratyekaṃ pratiniyatavṛttayaḥ santaḥ saṃbhūyaikāṃ prāṇākhyāṃ vṛttiṃ pratilapsyanta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8276: yuktaṃ tatra pratyekavṛttibhiravāntaravyāpāraiḥ pañjaracālanānurūpairevopetāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ pañjaraṃ cālayeyuriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8278: iha tu śravaṇādyavāntaravyāpāropetāḥ prāṇa na saṃbhūya prāṇyuriti yuktam,
GSP33brssgo2u:8281: tathā prāṇasya śreṣṭhatvādyudghoṣaṇaṃ guṇabhāvopagamaśca taṃ prati vāgādīnāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8284: kathaṃ tarhīyaṃ śrutiḥ 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8285: ucyate- vāyurevāyamadhyātmamāpannaḥ pañcavyūho viśeṣātmanāvatiṣṭhamānaḥ prāṇo nāma bhaṇyate na tattvāntaraṃ nāpi vāyumātram /
GSP33brssgo2u:8290: tathāhyanekavidhā vibhūtiḥ prāṇasya śrāvyate- 'supteṣu vāgādiṣu prāṇa eko hi jāgarti
GSP33brssgo2u:8291: prāṇa eko mṛtyunānāptaḥ prāṇaḥ saṃvargo vāgādīnsaṃvṛṅ kte prāṇa itarānprāṇānrakṣati
GSP33brssgo2u:8296: mukhyaḥ prāṇaḥ kiṃ vāyumātramuta karaṇānāṃ sādhāraṇavyāpāra āhosvittattvāntaramiti vāyuprāṇayorbhedābhedaśrutīnāṃ mithovirodhātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-tatreti
GSP33brssgo2u:8300: tatra prāṇo vāyunādhidaivikena bhātyabhivyañjyate abhivyaktaḥ saṃstapati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8302: śrutiṣu tatra tatra prāṇasya vāgādīnāṃ ca mithaḥ saṃvādaliṅgena pṛthagutpattiliṅgena cendriyatadabhinnavyāpārebhyo 'pi bhinnatvamityāha-tatheti
GSP33brssgo2u:8303: prāṇasyendriyavṛttitvaṃ śrutyā nirasya yuktyāpi nirasyati-naca samastānāmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8304: yā cakṣuḥ-sādhyā vṛttiḥ saiva na śrotrādisādhyā,
GSP33brssgo2u:8311: kiñca prāṇasya vṛttitve vāgādīnāmeva prādhānyaṃ vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8313: yathā mṛdo ghaṭo na vastvantaraṃ nāpi mṛṇmātraṃ tadvikāratvāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:8315: dehaṃ prāptaḥ pañcāvastho vikārātmanā sthito vāyureva prāṇa ityarthaḥ //9//
GSP33brssgo2u:8321: yathā cakṣurādīni rājaprakṛtivajjīvasya kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca pratyupakaraṇāni na svatantrāṇi /
GSP33brssgo2u:8322: tathā mukhyo 'pi prāṇo rājamantrivajjīvasya sarvārthakaratvenopakaraṇabhūto na svatantraḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8326: samānadharmāṇāṃ ca saha śāsanaṃ yuktaṃ bṛhadrathantarādivat /
GSP33brssgo2u:8332: yathā bṛhadrathantarayoḥ sarvatra sahaprayujyamānatvena sāmatvena vā sāmyātsahapāṭhastathā karaṇaiḥ sahopakaraṇatvena sāmyātprāṇasya pāṭha iti na hetvasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8341: rūpādyālocanādibhirvṛttibhiryathāsvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ jīvaṃ prati karaṇabhāvo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8342: apicaikādaśaiva kāryajātāni rūpālocanādīni parigaṇitāni yadarthamekādaśa prāṇāḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ natu dvādaśamaparaṃ kāryajātamadhigamyate yadarthamayaṃ dvādaśaḥ prāṇaḥ pratijñāyeteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8344: akaraṇatvāc ca na doṣas tathā hi darśayati / BBs_2,4.11 /
GSP33brssgo2u:8350: tathāhi śrutiḥ prāṇāntareṣvasaṃbhāvyamānaṃ mukhyaprāṇasya vaiśeṣikaṃ kāryaṃ darśayati
GSP33brssgo2u:8351: prāṇasaṃvādādiṣu- 'atha ha prāṇā ahaṃśreyasi vyūdire' ityupakramya 'yasminva utkrānte
GSP33brssgo2u:8352: śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataramiva dṛśyate sa vaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ' (chā. 5.1.6,7)
GSP33brssgo2u:8353: iti copanyasya pratyekaṃ vāgādyutkramaṇena tadvṛttimātrahīnaṃ yathāpūrvaṃ jīvanaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:8354: darśayitvā prāṇoccikramiṣāyāṃ vāgādiśaithilyāpattiṃ śarīrapātaprasaṅgaṃ ca darśayantī
GSP33brssgo2u:8356: 'tāvanvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāca mā mohamāpadyathāhamevaitatpañcadhātmānaṃ pravibhajyaitadbāṇamavaṣṭabhya vidhārayāmi,
GSP33brssgo2u:8358: 4.3.12) iti ca supteṣu cakṣurādiṣu prāṇanimittāṃ śarīrarakṣāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8360: 'tena yadaśnāti yatpibati tenetarānprāṇānavati' iti ca prāṇanimittāṃ śarīrendriyapuṣṭiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8361: 'kasminnvahamutkrānta utkrānto bhaviṣyāmi kasminvā pratiṣṭhite pratiṣṭhāsyāmi' iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:8362: 'sa prāṇamasṛjata' iti ca prāṇanimitte jīvasyotkrāntapratiṣṭhe darśayati // 11 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:8367: nanu yadbhogopakaraṇaṃ tatsaviṣayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā cakṣurādikaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8370: nirviṣayasyāpi prāṇasya śarīravadbhogopakaraṇatvamakṣataṃ na tu cakṣurādivajjñānakarmakaraṇatvamasti
GSP33brssgo2u:8378: tena prāṇena yadaśnāti jīvastvena prāṇakṛtāśaneneti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:8384: yatkāraṇaṃ pañcavṛttirayaṃ vyapadiśyate śrutiṣu 'prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samānaḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8392: yathā manasaḥ pañca vṛttaya evaṃ prāṇasyāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8393: śrotrādinimittāḥ śabdādiviṣayā manasaḥ pañca vṛttayaḥ prasiddhāḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8394: natu kāmaḥ saṃkalpaḥ ityādyāḥ paripaṭhitāḥ parigṛhyeran /
GSP33brssgo2u:8396: nanvatrāpi śrotrādinirapekṣā bhūtabhaviṣyadādiviṣayāparā manaso vṛttirastīti samānaḥ pañcasaṃkhyātirekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8397: evaṃ tarhi 'paramatamapratiṣiddhamanumataṃ bhavati' iti nyāyādihāpi yogaśāstraprasiddhā
GSP33brssgo2u:8400: bahuvṛttitvamātreṇa vā manaḥ prāṇasya nidarśanamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8409: kāmādivṛttivajjñāne 'pi pañcatvaniyamo nāstītyaruciṃ svayamevodbhāvya pakṣāntaraṃ gṛhṇāti-nanvatrāpītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8426: nanu vibhutvamapi prāṇasya samāmnāyate- 'samaḥ pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgena sama ebhistribhirlokaiḥ samo 'nena sarveṇa (bṛ. 1.3.22)
GSP33brssgo2u:8428: taducyate- ādhidaivikena samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpeṇa hairaṇyagarṇeṇa prāṇātmanaivaitadvibhutvamāmnāyate nādhyātmikena /
GSP33brssgo2u:8429: apica samaḥ pluṣiṇetyādinā sāmyavacanena pratiprāṇivartinaḥ prāṇasya pariccheda eva pradarśyate tasmādadoṣaḥ // 13 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:8430: FN: pluṣirmaśakādapi sūkṣmo jantuḥ, nāgo hastī /
GSP33brssgo2u:8437: śrutyā vibhutvamiti virodhe ādhyātmikaprāṇasyālpatvamādhidaivikasya vibhutvamiti viṣayabhedācchrutyoravirodha iti samādhatte-taducyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8438: kiñcopakrame prāṇasya pluṣyādisamatvenālpatvokteḥ sama ebhistribhirlokairiti virāḍdehasāmyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8448: te punaḥ prakṛtāḥ prāṇāḥ kiṃ svamahimnaiva svasmai kāryāya prabhavantyāhosviddevatādhiṣṭhitāḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:8449: prabhavantīti vicāryate- tatra prāptaṃ tāvadyathā svakāryaśaktiyogātsvamahimnaiva
GSP33brssgo2u:8451: apica devatādhiṣṭhitānāṃ prāṇānāṃ pravṛttāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ tāsāmevādhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ devatānāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgāccharīrasya bhoktṛtvaṃ pralīyeta
GSP33brssgo2u:8453: evaṃ prāptaṃ idamucyate- jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8455: jyotirādibhiragnyādyabhimāninībhirdevatābhiradhiṣṭhitaṃ vāgādi karaṇajātaṃ svakāryeṣu pravartata iti pratijānīte /
GSP33brssgo2u:8459: nahi devatāsaṃbandhaṃ pratyākhyāyāgnervāci mukhe vā kaścidviśeṣasaṃbandho dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8462: tathānyatrāpi vāgeva brahmaṇaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ so 'gninā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca' (chā. 3.18.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:8464: 'sa vai vācameva prathamāmatyavahatsā yadā mṛtyumatyamucyata so 'gnirabhavat' (bṛ. 1.3.12)
GSP33brssgo2u:8476: sa prāṇo vācaṃ prathamāmudgīthakarmāṇi pradhānāṃ anṛtādipāpmarūpaṃ mṛtyumatītyāvahanmṛtyunā muktāṃ kṛtvā agnidevatātmatvaṃ prāpitavān /
GSP33brssgo2u:8478: 'vācā hi nāmānyabhivadati cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyati'iti tṛtīyāśrutyānvayavyatirekavatyā
GSP33brssgo2u:8481: naca svakārye śaktānāmapi vāgādīnāmacetanatvādadhiṣṭhātrapekṣā na virudhyata iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8484: tathā caikatrānekabhoktṛṇāṃ virodhāddurbalasya jīvasya bhoktṛtvaṃ na syāditi pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8488: vāyuḥ prāṇādhiṣṭhātā bhūtvā nāsāpuṭe prāviśaditi vyākhyeyamityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8492: sa prāṇo vācaṃ prathamāmudgīthakarmaṇi pradhānāmanṛtādipāpmarūpaṃ mṛtyumatītyāvahanmṛtyunā muktāṃ kṛtvā agnidevatātmatvaṃ prāpitavānityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:8493: kiñca mṛtasyāgniṃ vāgapyeti vātaṃ prāṇaḥ cakṣurādityamityādiśrutirapyadhiṣṭhātradhiṣṭheyatvasaṃbandhaṃ dyotayatītyāha-sarvatreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8501: yadapyuktaṃ devatānāmevādhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgo na śārīrasyeti tatparihriyate-
GSP33brssgo2u:8503: satīṣvapi prāṇānāmadhiṣṭātrīṣu devatāsu prāṇavatā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātasvāminā śārīreṇaivaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ śruteravagamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8504: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'atha yatraitadākāśamanuviṣaṇṇaṃ cakṣuḥ sa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya takṣuratha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā gandhāya ghrāṇam' (chā. 8.124)
GSP33brssgo2u:8508: FN: atha dehe prāgapraveśānantaraṃ yatra golake etacchidramanupraviṣṭaṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ tatra cakṣuṣyabhimānī sa ātmā cākṣuṣaḥ tasya rūpadarśanāya cakṣuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8512: atha dehe prāṇapraveśānantaraṃ yatra golake etacchidramanupraviṣṭaṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:8513: tatra cakṣuṣyabhimānī sa ātmā cākṣuṣaḥ tasya rūpadarśanāya cakṣuḥ yadyapyātmā karaṇānyepakṣate
GSP33brssgo2u:8514: tathāpi jñeyajñānatadāśrayāhaṅkārānyo veda sa ātmā cidrūpa eva,
GSP33brssgo2u:8515: karaṇāni tu gandhādipravṛttaye 'pekṣyante na caitanyāyeti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8516: kiñca yo 'haṃ rūpamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhaṃ śṛṇomīti pratisaṃdhānādekaḥ śārīra eva bhoktā na bahavo devā ityāha-apiceti //15//
GSP33brssgo2u:8520: tasya ca śārīrasyāsmiñśarīre bhoktṛtvena nityatvena puṇyapāpopalepasaṃbhavātsukhaduḥkhopabhogasaṃbhavācca na devatānām /
GSP33brssgo2u:8521: tā hi parasminnaiśvarye pade 'vatiṣṭhamānā na hine 'smiñśarīre bhoktṛtvaṃ pratilabdhumarhanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8522: śrutiśca bhavati- 'puṇyamevāmuṃ gacchati na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati' (bṛ. 1.5.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:8523: iti śārīreṇaiva ca nityaḥ prāṇānāṃ saṃbandha utkrāntyādiṣu tadanuvṛttidarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8526: tasmātsatīṣvapi karaṇānāṃ niyantrīṣu devatāsu na śārīrasya bhoktṛtvamapagacchati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8528: kadāciddevānāmatrabhoktṛtvaṃ kadācijjīvasyetyaniyamo 'stvityāśaṅkya svakarmārjite dehe jīvasya bhoktṛtvaniyamānmaivamityāha-sūtrakāraḥ-tasya ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8530: devatānāṃ tu parasvāmikarathasārathivadadhiṣṭhātṛtvamātramiti vyākhyāntaramāha-śārīreṇaiva ca nitya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8531: yathā pradīpādiḥ karaṇopakārakatayā karaṇapakṣasyāntargatastathā devāḥ karaṇopakāriṇa eva na bhoktāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8533: devānāṃ tu karaṇopakārābhijñātayā sārathivadadhiṣṭhātṛtvamiti na jīvenānyathāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8534: devānāmadhiṣṭhātṛtvenāsmindehe bhoktṛtvānumānaṃ tu 'na ha vai devān pāpaṃ gacchati'ityuktaśrutibādhitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8535: tasmāt 'cakṣuṣā hi rūpāṇi paśyati'iti śruteḥ sādhanatvamātrabodhitvādagnirvāgbhūtvetyādyadhiṣṭhātṛdevatāpekṣābodhakaśrutibhiravirodha iti siddham
GSP33brssgo2u:8539: ta indriyāṇi tadvyapadeśād anyatra śreṣṭhāt / BBs_2,4.17 /
GSP33brssgo2u:8542: kiṃ mukhyasyaiva prāṇasya vṛttibhedā itare prāṇā āhosvittattvāntarāṇīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8546: tathāhi śrutirmukhyamitarāṃśca prāṇānsaṃnidhāpya mukhyātmatāmitareṣāṃ khyāpayati- 'hantāsyaiva sarve rūpamasāmeti ta etasyaiva sarve rūpamabhavan' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8550: tasmādyathaikasyaiva prāṇasya prāṇādyāḥ pañca vṛttaya evaṃ vāgādyā apyekādaśeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8555: te prakṛtāḥ prāṇāḥ śreṣṭhaṃ varjayitvāvaśiṣṭā ekādaśenjadriyāṇītyucyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:8558: iti hyevañjātīyakeṣu pradeśeṣu pṛthakprāṇo vyapadiśyate pṛthaktcendriyāṇi /
GSP33brssgo2u:8563: prāṇasya tvindriyatvaṃ na śrutau smṛtau vā prasiddhamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8565: tattvaikatve tu sa evaikaḥ sanprāṇa indriyavyapadeśaṃ labhate na labhate ceti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:8567: FN: asyaiva mukhyaprāṇasya rūpaṃ asāma bhavemeti saṃkalpya,
GSP33brssgo2u:8570: tānyeva prāṇavṛttivyatirekeṇa na santītyākṣepaṃ pratyāha-ta indriyāṇi tadvyapadeśādanyatra śreṣṭhāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8572: hanta idānīmasyaiva mukhyaprāṇasya sarve vayaṃ svarūpaṃ bhavāmeti saṃkalpya te vāgādayastathābhavannityabhedaśrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8576: te prāṇāḥ śreṣṭhādanyatra anye iti pratijñārthatvena padatrayaṃ vyācaṣṭe-tattvāntarāṇyeveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8578: prāṇā indriyāṇītyaparyāyaśabdābhyāmanyatvokteriti hetūpapādanārthatvena punastāni sūtrapadāni yojayati-ka ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8587: siddhānte manasaḥ pramopādānatvādātmavadanindriyatvamiṣṭaṃ tato notsargabādha iti kecit /
GSP33brssgo2u:8588: kiñca 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca'iti pṛthagjanmavyapadeśātsvatantravastubheda ityāha-vyapadeśabhedaścāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8589: ekasmin vākye prāṇa indriyaśabdamaikyāllabhate punaruktibhayānna labhate ceti vyāghāta ityarthaḥ //17//
GSP33brssgo2u:8594: bhedena vāgādibhyaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvatra śrūyate- 'te ha vācamūcuḥ' (bṛ. 1.3.2)
GSP33brssgo2u:8595: ityupakramya vāgādīnasurapāpmavidhvastānupanyasyopasaṃhṛtya vāgādiprakaraṇam 'atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇamūcuḥ' ityasuravidhvaṃsino mukhyasya prāṇasya pṛthagupakramāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8596: tathā 'mano vācaṃ prāṇaṃ tānyātmane 'kuruta' ityevamādyā api bhedaśrutaya udāhartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8599: bhedaśruteriti sūtreṇa prakaraṇabhedo heturukta iti na paunaruktyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8600: te ha devāḥ śāstrīyendriyamanovṛttirūpā asurāṇāṃ pāpavṛttirūpāṇāṃ jayārthamudgīthakarmaṇi
GSP33brssgo2u:8602: vācamanṛtādidoṣeṇa vidhvaṃsitavantosurā ityevaṃ krameṇa sarveṣvindriyeṣu pāpagrasteṣu
GSP33brssgo2u:8603: paścādatheti prakaraṇaṃ vicchidya prasiddhamāsye bhavamāsanyaṃ mukhyaṃ prāṇamūcustanna
GSP33brssgo2u:8604: tadgāyeti tena prāṇenodagātrā nirviṣayatayā saṅgadoṣaśūnyenāsurā naṣṭā ityasurāṇāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:8612: suṣupteṣu vāgādiṣu mukhya eko jāgarti sa eva caiko mṛtyunānāpta āptāstvitare /
GSP33brssgo2u:8614: viṣayālocanahetutvaṃ cendriyāṇāṃ na prāṇasyevañjātīyako bhūyāllakṣaṇabhedaḥ prāṇendriyāṇām /
GSP33brssgo2u:8621: iti vāgādīnīndriyāṇyanukramya 'tāni mṛtyuḥ śramo bhūtvopayeme tasmācchrāmyatyeva
GSP33brssgo2u:8622: vāk' iti ca śramarūpeṇa mṛtyunā grastatvaṃ vāgādīnāmabhidhāya 'athemameva nāpnodyo
GSP33brssgo2u:8627: tasmāttadavirodhena vāgādiṣu parispandalābhasya prāṇāyattatvaṃ tadrūpabhavanaṃ vāgādīnāmiti mantavyaṃ na tādātmyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8631: iti mukhyaprāṇaviṣayasyaiva prāṇaśabdasyendriyeṣu lākṣaṇikīṃ vṛttiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8639: etadeva prāṇaśabdasyendriyeṣu lakṣaṇābījaṃ śrutau 'tasmādeta etenākhyāyanta'iti parāmṛṣṭam,
GSP33brssgo2u:8645: satprakriyāyāṃ tejobannānāṃ sṛṣṭimabhidhāyopadiśyate- 'seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīti
GSP33brssgo2u:8650: yathā loke cāreṇāhaṃ parasainyamanupraviśya saṃkalayānītyevañjātīyake prayoge cārakartṛkameva
GSP33brssgo2u:8653: apica ḍitthaḍavitthādiṣu nāmasu ghaṭaśarāvādiṣu ca rūpeṣu jīvasyaiva vyākartṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8661: tathā kuśakāśapalāśādiṣu paśumṛgamanuṣyādiṣu ca pratyākṛti prativyakti cānekaprakārā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8662: sā khalu parameśvarasyaiva tejobannānāṃ nirmātuḥ kṛtirbhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8664: tathāhi- 'seyaṃ devataikṣata' ityupakramya 'vyākaravāṇi' ityuttamapuruṣaprayogeṇa parasyaiva brahmaṇo vyākartṛtvamihopadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8669: tena hi saṃbandhe vyākaravāṇītyayaṃ devatāviṣaya uttamapuruṣa aupacārikaḥ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:8670: naca girinadīsamudrādiṣu nānāvidheṣu nāmarūpeṣvanīśvarasya jīvasya vyākaraṇasāmarthyamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8671: yeṣvapi cāsti sāmarthyaṃ teṣvapi parameśvarāyattameva tat /
GSP33brssgo2u:8672: naca jīvo nāma parameśvarādatyantabhinnaścāra iva rājñaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8682: tacca trivṛtkaraṇamagnyādityacandravidyutsu śrutirdarśayati- 'yadagre rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasastadrūpaṃ yacchuklaṃ tadapāṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya' (chā. 6.4.1) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8684: sati ca rūpavyākaraṇe viṣayapratilambhādagniritīdaṃ nāma vyākriyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8686: anena cāgnyādyudāharaṇena bhaumāmbhasataijaseṣu triṣvapi dravyeṣvaviśeṣeṇa trivṛtkaraṇamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8689: aviśeṣeṇaiva copasaṃhāraḥ - 'yadu rohitamivābhūditi tejasastadrūpam' ityevamādiḥ 'yadavijñātamivābhūdityetāsāmeva devatānāṃ samāsa iti' (chā. 6.4.6.7) evamantaḥ // 20 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:8691: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ tejobannātmanā tryātmikāṃ kariṣyāmīti śrutiḥ pañcīkaraṇopalakṣaṇārthā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8692: utpattirutpādaneti ca kāryakartrorvyāpārau prasiddhau tatra jagadutpattiśrutivirodhaḥ atītena pādadvayaina nirastaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8695: sthūlabhūtotpādane tvasti śrutivipratipattiriti tannirāsārthamāha-saṃjñāmūrtikḷptistu trivṛtkurvata upadeśāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8700: hanta idānīṃ devatāḥ sūkṣmā anupraviśyeti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8701: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ tejobannātmanā tryātmikāṃ kariṣyāmīti śrutiḥ pañcīkaraṇopalakṣaṇārthā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8703: evaṃ sthūlīkṛteṣu bhūteṣu prāṇināṃ vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti paradevatāyāstātparyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8705: pūrvapakṣe jīvasyaiva bhautikasraṣṭṛtvādbrahmaṇaḥ sarvasraṣṭṛtvāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8706: jīvenetyasya vyākaravāṇītipradhānakriyāpadena saṃbandha iti pūrvapakṣamāha-tatra prāptamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8707: paradevatāyā akartṛtve kathamuttamapuruṣaprayoga ityāśaṅkya prayojakatvātkartṛtvopacāra ityāha-yathā loka iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8714: nanu tarhi praveśakriyā jīvakartṛkā vyākaraṇamīśvarakartṛkamiti kartṛbhedāt kṛtvāpratyayo na syādityata āha-naca jīvo nāmeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8715: vastutastu sūryo jale praviṣṭa iti pratibimbabhāvākhyapraveśe sūryasyaiva kartṛtvaprayogājjīvātmanā praveśe 'pīśvara eva karteti kṛtvāśrutiryukteti bodhyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8716: nanvabhedaścejjīva eva vyākartā kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkya kalpanayā bhinnasya tasyāśaktatvācchrutivirodhācca maivamityāha-parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8717: pratyekaṃ mahābhūtasargasya prāguktatvādiha vyākaraṇavākye yatnapūrvakaṃ sthīlabhautikasarga ucyata iti pāṭhavyatyayena sūtrasūcitaṃ śrutyarthamāha-trivṛtkaraṇapūrvakamiti
GSP33brssgo2u:8721: nanvagnyādīnāṃ taijasānāmeva śrutāvudāharaṇadbhūjalayosatryātmakatvaṃ na vivakṣitamityata āha-anena ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8723: yatkapotarūpādikaṃ kṛṣṇatvādiviśeṣākāreṇa vijñātamiva bhavati taddevatānāṃ samudāyarūpamityarthaḥ //20//
GSP33brssgo2u:8726: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ bahistrivṛtkṛtānāṃ satīnāmadhyātmamaparaṃ trivṛtkaraṇamuktam- 'imāstisro devatāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpya trivṛttrivṛdekaikā bhavati' (chā. 6.4.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8730: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'annamaśitaṃ tredhā vidhīyate tasya yaḥ sthaviṣṭho dhātustatpurīṣaṃ bhavati yo madhyamastanmāṃsaṃ yo 'ṇiṣṭhastanmanaḥ' (chā. 6.5.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8740: uttarasūtreṇāśaṅkitaṃ doṣaṃ nirasitumādau śaṅkāviṣayamādhyātmikatrivṛtkaraṇaṃ darśayatīti bhāṣyārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8741: nanvannamayaṃ māṃsādi kathaṃ bhaumamityata āha-trivṛtkṛtā bhūmireveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8745: atrāha- yadi sarvameva trivṛtkṛtaṃ bhūtabhautikamaviśeṣaśruteḥ 'tāsa trivṛtaṃ trivṛtamekaikāmakarot' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8746: kiṅkṛtastarhyayaṃ viśeṣavyapadeśaḥ 'idaṃ teja imā āpa idamannam' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8757: vyavahāraśca trivṛtkṛtarajjuvadekatvāpattau satyāṃ na bhedena bhūtatrayagocaro lokasya prasiddhyet /
GSP33brssgo2u:8758: tasmātsatyapi trivṛtkaraṇe vaiśeṣyādeva tejobannaviśeṣavādo bhūtabhautikaviṣaya upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8767: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmadgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
